1113122113221111112221311112.content:
"Fine," Nick relented, accepting the stone. "I'm not in any hurry to be tiny again anyway. You want to go crawling around the disgusting vents again, be my guest."

"Thank you, Nick," Judy said as she looked around the hall. "Though we should probably do this somewhere private. You're about to grow twice your height and we don't need you running naked around the halls."

To that, they both agreed and ran off to the nearest bathroom before locking the door tight behind them.

Nick immediately starting to strip as he held the stone tight, pressing hard against it so he wouldn't go flying. Once he was naked, he closed his eyes and made the wish twice. Two violent flashes filled the bathroom as Nick felt himself surge upwards while Judy's uniform began to look crumpled and too big on her. By the time Nick was back to his normal height of 80 centimeters, Judy was wearing her shirt like a dress and the pants were a folded mess on the floor. When it all stopped, Nick could see the top of the sinks (this was a bathroom for bigger mammals like wolves and tigers after all and at his new height of 100 centimeters he was still a great deal smaller than all of them). Judy, however, didn't even come up to his knees standing at 15 centimeters tall.

"Hmm," she squeaked as she approached the grate on the bathroom floor. "It's tight, but I should make it."

"Good luck then," Nick leaned over and handed her the stone. "I'll be waiting in this bathroom when you find him. Then we'll figure out how to fix this. I'm trusting you with this. Don't involve anyone else this time."

And with that, Judy set out carrying the stone over her head like it was a small boulder for her, though again it weighted surprisingly like nothing. Judy focused on her hearing and got to work trying to pinpoint where she could hear Bogo's shouting from.

Unfortunately, being smaller also meant that the range of her hearing was also diminished. Not to mention, the vents were sweltering being the ones for the boiler. Thankfully it wasn't fully on or she might end up a tiny toasted marshmallow rabbit. One bad turn too many and she completely lost track of where she was, even with a mental map of the ZPD headquarters.

"Chief!" Judy called out. "Nick! Can anyone hear me?"

But she was met with silence and the crushing realization that she was now horribly lost.

Judy sat down on the stone and pondered what she should do next. That was when...
1113122113221111112221311112.title: The Lost, Tiny Bunny

choices: Judy makes a break for it and slips back into the vents.
Judy manages to reason with the two and they help her.
Judy tries to reason but fails and they trap her under a coffee mug!
11131221132211111122213111121.content:
Suddenly, while Judy was thinking to herself, she was interrupted by a blinding flash of light from above her. This was followed by a gigantic orange striped paw clasping itself around her tiny body and snatching her up.

"See? I told you I heard a mouse crawling around in our vents. They must have broken into the station."

"That's not a mouse, Fang. Look!"

As Judy's vision cleared, she found herself in one of the smaller breakrooms at the ZPD, empty of all except two mammals. Both of whom were fellow officers. Officer Wolfard (140 cm), the grey wolf, was standing there gawking at Judy. Meanwhile, the paws Judy found herself wrapped around belonged to the towering tiger, Officer Fangmeyer (225 cm). Even under normal circumstances, Judy felt tiny around these two. But in her stunted state, her fellow officers were truly giants in her eyes. Even in Fang's paws, Judy felt more like a doll than an actual person. Suddenly, she found herself longing to be big again.

"Hopps?" Fang blinked, recognizing the rabbit eyes on the diminutive being in her paws. "What the heck happened to you?"

Now frantic at being discovered, Judy looked around for the stone and saw its shine in the open vent where Fangmeyer had pried her from. The stone had been left behind and was just sitting there! Judy thought about escaping, but these were her fellow officers who sounded concerned. Maybe she could try reasoning with them?
11131221132211111122213111121.title: Judy Gets Caught by Fangmeyer!

choices: They should play it safe and just start in the boiler room at normal sizes.
They should shrink Wolfard and use his nose to sniff out Bogo.
111312211322111111222131111212.content:
Squirming around, Judy quickly realized there was no way she was going to get out of this. She had been caught and now they had seen and identified her. What would Nick do in this situation? Her swallowed her naked pride and addressed the two giants.

"Um, hi, uh, Fangmeyer and Wolfard."

"Hello yourself," Wolfard said with a laugh. "I know rabbits are supposed to be small, Hopps, but you're look even more stunted than usual."

"Greg," Fangmeyer grunted. "She's naked. Give her a little bit of privacy."

"Oop, sorry, Hopps."

Judy held on tight as Fangmeyer's paw started to move again. It was quite a rush to be held like a doll, something she'd find rather exciting were it not for the fear of discovery sending her heart into conniptions. Fangmeyer was taking her over to the counter and set her down gently with an open paw. Judy had to gawk at just how small she had become when Fangmeyer then offered her a napkin which could cover her up like a towel.

"So, Hopps," Fang said. "Do you have a reasonable explanation of why you're suddenly a fourth your normal height?"

"You aren't going to believe this," Judy said knowing she was about to sound crazy. "But over in the vents there, there's this stone that if you make a wish on someone with it, it saps half of their height and gives it to you."

"What stone?" Wolfard asked before reaching into the open vent grate and pulling up the red bauble. "You mean this?"

"Be careful with that! One wrong thought and I might disappear into nothing or Fang might be cub-sized!"

"And someone else used it on you several times?" Fang asked with some concern.

"Because I asked them to! Bogo got shrunk down to 5 centimeters and now he's lost and running through the vents somewhere, only I can't find him."

"Bogo's involved with this," Wolfard asked. "No wonder he wasn't at the bullpen today. Jas, this is serious then."

"I'm aware," Fangmeyer replied with a stern sense of duty. "Our priority should be to find and safely return the Chief. Then we can discuss what to do about our magical stone. If he's crawling around in the boiler vent, he's in grave danger should he end up in the actual boiler. Maybe we should check there first and map out our route."

"Or how about you shrink me, Jas? I can go with Hopps in the vents and help sniff him out. I got a good nose for it, after all."

"You really want to risk getting stuck like that?"

"There's no danger to it," Judy promised. "You can switch back just as easily. Trust me, I was almost seven and a half feet tall just a little while ago."

"It's your call, Greg," Fang said. "I still say we don't play with sizes anymore and start in the boiler room."

Wolfard thought about it before deciding...
111312211322111111222131111212.title: The Tiny Diplomat

1113122113221111112221311112122.content:
"If Bogo's in the boiler, he's in danger," Wolfard explained. "And he could be anywhere. The quickest way to find him is going to be to use my nose to do it. It's for the Chief...Plus it could be kind of cool to see the world from a new perspective."

Judy wasn't paying enough attention to notice Wolfard blush as he said that while looking to Fangmeyer. The tigress just rolled her eyes and said.

"If it's your decision then so be it."

"It is," Wolfard said, tossing the stone around. "So, should Fang be the one to take my height or...?"

"I have an idea for that," Judy spoke up from the counter. "Fangmeyer, can you pick me up and put me in your pocket? Then we can head to Bogo's office."

The two predator officers shared a look of confusion but did as Judy ordered.

It was quite thrilling to be along for the ride as Judy peeked out from Fangmeyer's breast pocket. With her and Wolfard at normal size, no one in the ZPD batted an eye at them even as they went about their normal day. Eventually though, they reached Bogo's office and upon stepping in were greeted by a familiar wall of fatty cheetah fur.

"Oh," said Fangmeyer.

"My," said Wolfard.

"Goodness," boomed Clawhauser, as he leered down at them. "Jas and Greg, you two look sooo adorable from up here! I could just pick you up!"

"What?" Wolfard gawked as Clawhauser's chubby paws reached around him and lifted him up effortlessly. "Hey, hey, hey!"

"Clawhauser," Judy shouted from Fangmeyer's pocket so the giant cheetah could hear her. "I ran into a problem and Bogo is somewhere in the boiler vents! I need Wolfard's nose to track him down, and I figured you could be the bank for everyone's height until we can sort this mess out properly. I need you to shrink Wolfard down to my size. Three times should do it."

"Can do, Jude."

Clawhauser looked at Wolfard expectantly, who reached out his pocket and dropped the stone into Clawhauser's massive other paw. "Uh, here you go, big guy."

After Clawhauser set Wolfard, there was a flash and both of them started changing.

Clawhauser continued to swell bigger and bigger, though he was already so large that most of the growth was barely noticeable save for the furniture that pushed out of the way to fit his flabby body. Wolfard, however, whined slightly as he sunk further into his clothes until they were much too big on him. Once even with Fangmeyer's chest in height, now he only came up to her thighs and looked more like a child than a police officer.

Another flash and the changes continued. Wolfard crawled out of his clothes before he could lost in them while Clawhauser was becoming so large that his foot paws were almost half the size of Fangmeyer, who was watching the events with a stern expression that masked her fascination.

One final flash and Wolfard was now approaching Judy on the floor. He got smaller and smaller and smaller until they stood at the exact same height. Wolfard had gone from his old height of 140 cm to staring eye to eye with Judy at 15 cm. Clawhauser, however, had sucked up all that height to bring him up to 650 cm, or over twenty one feet tall. Even the giant Fangmeyer looked puny in comparison to the planet-sized Clawhauser, giggled in the now much too cramped office space.

"Jas," Clawhauser said, raising an even bigger paw in her direction. "You're like a doll to me."

Fangmeyer wasn't so easy as Wolfard and grabbed hold of the tubby cheetah paw with her claws. "Don't even think about it."

As Clawhauser pulled back to the corner of his office with a regretful look on his face, Fang walked over to Judy and Wolfard to kneel at them and speak.

"While you guys are searching through the vents, what do you want me to do?"

"Since you're your normal height, can you go to the bathroom on the third floor?" Judy asked. "Nick's trapped in there naked. You can bring him Wolfard's clothes and get him back to Bogo's office."

"I gotta say," said Wolfard. "It's a little sobering to suddenly have a bunny the same size as you after looking down at them for so long, no offense Hopps."

"You'll get used to it," Judy replied before shouting again. "Clawhauser! Give me the stone again for safe keeping."

And with the stone in paw, the tiny bunny and wolf made their way into the vents to start their adventure. Wolfard immediately picked up the scent and they were led towards...
1113122113221111112221311112122.title: The Little Wolf and Bunny

choices: Dive in and help, but get flushed too.
Shrink the janitor, sort the mess out later.
Go for help, but have to track down the missing pair via plumbing now.
11131221132211111122213111121223.content:
"This way," Wolfard gestured. "I can smell him. He smells...Wet."

Judy wasn't about to question Wolfard's nose though her ears could detect the sound of running water above them and they delved deeper into the bowels of the station. Eventually, they could hear the sound of running water as they approached another grate on the ventilation floor. Wolfard sniffed closely at it.

"There," he said, gesturing down in the slots. "Look!"

They were in one of the restrooms down in the basement. Like most bathrooms, it was built for the larger mammals in mind, as Judy had once discovered after slipping into one and even being flushed down one during the Nighthowler case. Though the drop was a long ways away, if Judy squinted she saw something swimming around in one of the toilet bowls far below.

"Is that...?"

"Bogo!" Wolfard confirmed. "Come on, let's jump down and get him out of there."

"Are you crazy? We should go turn around and get help from someone who's normal sized, now that we know where he is."

They weren't left much time for debate as at that moment, one of the janitors came in. He was one of the ones Judy recognized but regrettably never got the name for, a younger porcupine who was always wearing headphones and blaring music. After briefly scrubbing the floors, he then turned to the toilet stalls and began flushing each of them. Bogo's toilet was further down the line, but it was inevitable that he also get sent down the plumbing. And judging by his panicked splashing, he seemed to know that too.

"There's no time, Hopps," said Wolfard before he slipped through the grate and dove straight into the toilet.

Judy was left with the choice. She could dive in after them and try to help them out. But she could also try to shrink the janitor so that she could put his flushing spree to a quick stop, though that might only complicate matters further. She could stick to her original plan and go for help, then summon the others to track down Wolfard and Bogo.

What would Judy do?
11131221132211111122213111121223.title: The Plumbing Incident

choices: Grow one of them to get out quick.
Risk going on a long walk to find a way out.
Try to find someone to help them.
111312211322111111222131111212231.content:
One thing about Judy Hopps was her unfortunate habit to jump headfirst into things without thinking. Seeing her co-worker and her boss struggling in the bowl of a toilet about to be flushed, Judy couldn't do anything else but dive in after them with the stone still in arms. She plopped into the water next to them, trying to help Wolfard with the much smaller Bogo.

"Try to pull him up," Judy squeaked before she was greeted with the unmistakable sound of a lever being pulled.

Suddenly, the three of them were in a massive whirlwind that pushed them off of the sides of the bowl and sent them swirling around in several circles before trailing down the drain. Judy held her breath as she was plunged into a wet darkness that amounted to a water slide. She had been flushed down a toilet once before with Nick, though then she at least knew where she was going to end up. The pipes of the ZPD were a mystery to her as she listened to the terrified screams of Wolfard and Bogo in front of her.

Eventually, the ride was over and they ended up in a pool of the foulest smelling liquid that had ever passed through Judy's nose. Coughing, Judy immediately swam to a nearby edge using the stone as a flotation device and pulled herself out before helping Wolfard and then Bogo close behind her.

"Hopps," Bogo growled, that it became comical when he was a third her size. "You have a lot of explaining to do."

"Sorry, sir," Judy said, leaning over to meet him closer to eye level. "We were looking all over for you and we had to do something."

"Yes, and now we seem to all be trapped in the sewers. When we get out of this, Hopps, I am going to have your badge."

Judy winced, though expected as much. The stone was still in her arms and she had to bury the thought of shrinking Bogo down even more to the point where he'd be the size of a bug.

"We should probably focus on the problem at paw first," Wolfard interrupted the pair. "Namely how we get out of here."

"Right," said Judy. "Any exits?"

"Just one. And you're not gonna like it."

Wolfard pointed to the narrow shaft above them. It was a mammal-hole cover with a ladder going up to reach it. This of course presented a new problem as Judy and Wolfard were both too short to reach it at 15 centimeters each.

"We're too small," Wolfard moaned. "Even if we managed to climb all the way up there, neither of us would have the strength to push it open."

"What if one of us was big enough?" Judy asked, showing the stone still in her arms.

"Absolutely not," Bogo growled in a high pitched voice. "You've done enough damage with whatever that thing is."

"We could always try to look for another way," offered Wolfard. "There are multiple tunnels down here, it looks like. One should lead us out of here."

"We should find an authority figure," Bogo stated plainly. "The city sewers have dozens of workers around the clock. We should find their main office down here. Explain to them what happened and have them return us to the ZPD."

Judy gulped. She was the one with the stone and thus felt like the one who could call the shots. Her plan might be quick but might earn more bad points in Bogo. Wolfard's way could work, but would be a dangerous and long walk. Though confronting someone while mouse sized could also be dangerous too. She decided that they should...
111312211322111111222131111212231.title: Stuck in the Sewers

1113122113221111112221311112122311.content:
After standing in the stench they were in for too long, Judy finally made her decision and aimed the stone at Bogo to make two wishes. The already diminutive buffalo shrunk even smaller and Wolfard turned to find that he was now staring up at Judy. Though five extra centimeters wasn't a lot of height, at their size it made enough difference to have Judy now towering over the hapless wolf at 20 centimeters to his 15. Bogo, on the otherhand, had been reduced from the size of a mouse to the size of a bug as there could be high pitched screaming.

"Hopps," Wolfard protested. "What are you doing?"

"Sorry, Greg," Judy said as she aimed the stone at him. "This is the quickest way I can think of."

Judy squeezed tightly onto the stone as she blasted Wolfard also twice. As the blinding light cleared, Wolfard found himself shrinking down to the size Bogo had been just a second ago while Judy exploded in height before him. She grew to be twice of what she had previously been, which was still only half of her normal height at 30 centimeters. But before the two shrunken officers, Judy might as well been a giantess.

"I can reach it now," Judy said as she climbed the ladder and tried to push. Though she was much bigger, she was still very small and it took all her strength to even budge it an inch. "See? An opening."

"And now we're tiny and you're big," Wolfard replied as he scooped up the tinier Bogo to hold in his paw.

"Well, I was the one with the stone. And it's more plausible for a rabbit to pass at my height than a water buffalo or wolf."

"True...I guess we'll just have to see where this leads and get back to the station somehow."

As Judy pushed again, she managed to move the sewer cover far enough that she could squeeze out. She reached down and grabbed Wolfard, still holding Bogo, and carried the both of them up into the city. That's when they discovered they had entered...
1113122113221111112221311112122311.title: Judy the Mini Mini Giantess

choices: Judy lets Nick keep his new size.
Judy asks Nick for the rock back.
11131221132212.content:
Nick grinned as he stretched, feeling himself grow quicker, standing up from Judy's paw.

"Woah.." Judy said, smiling bright. "You're growing so quick!" She said.

The formerly 4 inch fox was now up to 1 ft 6. No, make that 1 ft 8.

And still he grew. Judy, at 4 ft 3.2, was just under twice his size.

But he quickly caught up to her.. He stared her in the eyes, chuckling.

She looked up, grinning. "Woah. You're getting so big~" She said, hugging him.

"What if... I don't really need to be such close to others to take his height?" Judy asked himself. She stood and cross the room as she used to while she have case to solve. At her size she need just few steps to come to opposite wall. Everything was so new, such unbelievable at this perspective. "Sorry... It's hard to used to be such big. " rabbit respond. She put her free hand on the wall and with that support she try to used to her new, much higher perspective. Deep inside her she feel happy with every secound with that situation. There was something pleasantly nice in this. And also she feel soo amased if she could grow even bigger. "Nick. Do you remember that wolf whose shoot to us doring the raid?"

"It's hard to forget, he was really precise. Why you asked?"

"...If only Nick knew what it was like to be small," Judy privately whined to herself. "Come to think of it, I would love to know what it's like to be big for a change. He and the others have it so much easier sometimes."

Unbeknownst to her, the stone in her paw glowed an eerie red as she set it down on her nightstand to remember to bring it into the evidence locker tomorrow.

It happened gradually, starting first with their...

11132231132.content:
"I wish that Nick and I could see eye to eye," Judy privately wished. "That a big change would happen!"

No sooner than had Judy made that wish then the stone began to glow until it was blinding to look at. In a flash, it just disappeared in Judy's paws as the pair stared at each other.

"Wha," Judy said, looking around the floor. "Where did it go? I just had it!"

"I dunno," Nick said rubbing his eyes. "But that's one heck of a camera flash."

Little did the two of them know that the stone had simply returned to its point of origin, now that a wish had been made. The stone worked in mysterious ways and some said it even had a sense of humor. You see, it had belonged to a tribe of elephants at one point in the distant past, who used it to bolster the numbers in their clan. A lesson Judy and Nick were about to learn the hard way. The condition was that every time the victim sneezed, they'd take on more aspects of an elephant. If, after 24 hours, they were fully transformed into one then the change would be permanent. If not then they would change back.

The only question was which one of them would sneeze first?

12.title: A mysterious remote

12532.content: So, a remote that lets the user inflate whatever or whoever it's pointed at? That could be fun. But who's going to find it while they're patrolling Sahara Square?
12532.title: Inflation Remote

125321.content:
It was another blistering day in Sahara Square as our favorite cop duo, Nick Wilde and Judy Hopps, were writing up a truck that had slammed into a fire hydrant.

Judy was busy giving her typical rant at the driver for being so careless and endangering people while Nick just sat back and watched her work, writing up the ticket. He had the easy job in comparison and the poor camel driver in question was looking worse than if he had been in an actual bad accident. Nick finished up early enough and passed the time by looking at the name on the semitrailer. Mumbo's Magical Devices.

"Huh," Nick couldn't help but say to himself. "There's a first. A name I don't know in Zootopia."

The cabin was undamaged, but the back had taken a dent and the doors had swung open. Thankfully, only one box had spilled out onto the street and the driver had been quick to pick it up. A few loose items that looked like TV remotes had scattered on the road, but Nick didn't pay it much mind. The camel looked more concerned about the state of his package rather than his actual truck.

"...And don't do it again," Judy said, putting on her best impression of Bogo.

With his head hung low, the camel returned to his cabin and pulled out onto the road while Judy continued to direct traffic. Nick went to inspect the hydrant, now that the truck had moved, but thankfully there had been no damage done to the hippo-sized water container. Though Nick noticed something else on the ground.

"Huh, guess the poor guy missed one."

It was far too late to flag the driver down, with him having sped off. Nick figured they would trace it back to the company owner eventually as he thumbed at the device.

It certainly looked like a TV remote at a glance, though it only had two buttons. A plus sign and a negative sign.

"This had to be the worst remote control I've ever seen," he muttered to no one in particular.

Without much of a thought, he thumbed at the buttons. Who wouldn't, after all. Nick absentmindedly clicked the plus sign in a general direction, and that direction just so happened to be Judy Hopps. To his surprise, an almost invisible bolt of lightning shot from the top of the remote and straight at Judy without her even noticing it.

The bolt struck her right in the...
125321.title: A Funny Little Remote

choices: Nick lies and tests the plus button some more.
Nick lies and fixes Judy with the minus button.
Nick comes clean and reveals the remote.
1253211.content:
Nick winced as he watched the electric bolt strike Judy right in her presented posterior. He was waiting for her to give some kind of yelp, with mammals have been victim to more than a few cases of static shock before. Only that didn't seem to happen.

The bolt instead arced into Judy's already shapely bottom (yes, Nick could admit to looking for time to time). There it was absorbed in almost a blink of an eye. Nick quickly hid the remote behind his back, afraid someone might notice what happened. Judy certainly didn't and it was a good thing too as Nick's eyes drifted below the equator. His jaw dropped like when she had busted him for tax evasion.

There was no kind way to say it. Judy's butt was inflating.

It was like someone had taken an air pump and used it several times, like in the cartoons, all focused on her rear end. Her tail went straight up as there was slightly more space for it to be resting on. Indeed, her rump was starting to look more like a shelf for her cottontail. But then, just as suddenly as it had begun, it stopped.

"Nick?" Judy must have realized he had been staring at her. "Is something wrong?"

Somehow Judy remained blissfully aware that there was significantly more of her down below. Nick to process all that had happened in the span of a few seconds before she starting asking the wrong questions. Somehow, he had gotten his paws on a magical remote that could...Well, inflate people. And he had just used it on his partner, making her more pleasing to the eye.

Judy looked at him expectantly as he went with the first thing to came to mind...
1253211.title: Bunny Butt

choices: "...Yes, we should do to the ZPD with this."
"...But maybe we should investigate this company on our own."
"...Do you like girls with big butts, Nick?"
12532113.content:
As much as this new development was kickstarting his dirty, male mind, Nick had to come clean to Judy. It wasn't right to be manipulating her body like this without her knowledge. But how to approach her on the matter? He couldn't exactly go "your butt looks big" without earning himself a slap across the snout, speaking from experience. It just needed to be in the right time and place, not standing in the middle of the street with people watching them.

"Say, um, Carrots. Do you mind stepping to the alleyway for just a moment?"

She raised an eye but then shrugged. "Sure, Nick. What's on your mind?"

With her walking in front of him, it took an immense amount of self control to not look down at her inflated tush. Nick passed the time time thumbing at the remote behind his back. When they were out of sight from anyone and Nick was sure that they would not be overheard, he cleared his throat.

Judy continued to keep her eyes shut as a wave of excitement passed over her. She could barely contain herself as she waited patiently for Nick to make his decision, all the while battling with herself. Indeed, her thoughts were something of a war zone. The rational part of her was telling herself that this was impossible. Mammals didn't just inflate. Yet, here it was. The ability to make anyone bigger with just the push of a button.

She would never admit it to anyone, but she hated the fact that she was always the small one. Even among rabbits, she was rather shorter and skinny. Her parents called it the "runt of the litter" syndrome, which is why they attributed it to Judy's need to do dangerous things like being a cop. That deep longing to be seen as one of the bigger mammals developed into something more pronounced when she reached adolescence, like a secret obsession as she found herself drawn to curious things like the scene in the blueberry scene in Willy Woofa and the Chocolate Factory. Though it wasn't until a few months of living in the city that she stumbled across something that truly defined her interest. They didn't have much in the way of internet on the farm, after all.

Through careful research, she discovered that there was a society within mammal culture which fantasized about inflating themselves into giant balloons. Judy once laughed at the prospect, until she found it fascinating enough to fall down the literal rabbit hole. Suddenly, she was immersed in what amounted to a secret internet cult, making an anonymous persona and infiltrating several groups for various catered specifics that caught her eye. She approached the matter with the same vigor and determination as she did anything she set her mind to and rather ambitiously made a name for herself rather quickly.

In short, she had become a closet inflation fetishist in the span of a few months.

Those first few days were intense, scouring the catalogue of various artists and writers who had pooled collective works together in the many unsavory and deviant places on the internet. Over time, she developed a refined taste and could hunt down exactly what she knew scratched her particular itch. More often than not, she would spend her work hours daydreaming of what might await her back at the apartment when she had alone time. She wouldn't dare use the work computer for such activities, after all. It was only when she had become situated enough that she would begin fantasying what it would be like with her as the intended victim. To become bigger, bloated, balloony, full, and swollen. There were several brave mammals she had seen videos of who would actually use a hose in the most inglorious ways to achieve a partial real life effect. But nothing like the dream.

It was for that reason why Judy found herself shaking with anticipation as Nick pulled the trigger and let her wildest fantasies come true.

Judy yelped and brought a paw to her belly. Now that she was really focusing on it, she could feel it happen as the bolt of electricity from the remote settled into her stomach to do its business. What followed was a rising sense of pressure akin to what might happen if one drank a whole liter of soda in one sitting. It was like having a burp that couldn't quite get out. And with that growing pressure came a fullness like eating a very hefty meal. And just when Judy felt like her stomach couldn't hold anymore of whatever she was filling up with, she broke beyond her limit. That was when the swelling started.

There was a tightness in her lower abdomen that caused her to panic slightly until she realized it was her belt cutting into her growing stomach. It looked as if she was taking her deepest breath out, and try as she might she couldn't suck the gut back in. Instead it only pushed forward at a steady and comfortable pace. Judy quickly undid the strap of her utility cord and was met with instant relief as her inflated stomach surged forward a few inches. To the unknowing observer, it might look like she was a few months pregnant. Her fur was tight as a drum beneath her jumpsuit, yet somehow it was able to keep stretching like it was made of elastic.

As she felt around her growing new addition, she bit back a moan. Her paws traced around her expanding girth, finding unfamiliar curves as she explored herself. The surprise came when she found her hips were also growing outwards, giving her a distinctly pear shaped silhouette. There was the faintest sound of a hiss in the air, if she listened closely enough.

She could feel when the experience stopped, her body settling into place to accommodate her enhanced attributes. It was almost disappointing were it not for how tight and stretched out Judy was feeling already from the experience.

Nick looked just as fascinated in the expansion as she was as he lowered the remote. "How do you feel?"

Judy bounced on the balls of her feet, expecting there to be some heavy resistance with so much more of her taking up her point of view. The laws of mass told her that she should be weightier and bulky, but she didn't feel that way at all. More like the opposite.

"Light," Judy commented. "Almost like I'm filling up with air."

Indeed, a pat on her stomach caused a hollow noise to resonate from her touch. Nick continued to step around in the background, looking over his shoulder.

"Alright," he said. "I pressed the button. Now we gotta get you back to normal before someone sees."

Judy was suddenly overtaken by an irrational rush of fear, like the thought she might lose something. She had finally gotten to be big, or at least bigger, and the idea of someone taking that away from her was enough to abandon all logical thought.

"Wait," she bargained. "Just one more press. Then we can go back."

"Wow. You must really like this, huh?"

"Don't you?" Judy asked, showing off her new curves. "You're the one who picked this part of me to grow, after all."

"Oh, don't you guilt me into this. You were practically begging me for it. How come I gotta be the responsible one here? You're messing with our group dynamics."

"Please, Nick," she put on the best face she could to warm his heart.

Nick groaned and aimed the remote at her again before saying...

"How about you go to normal for now?" Nick asked, pulling back the remote as soon as Judy made a jump for it. "But then we play with this in private? You know? When we're off duty and not lurking in the alleyway like a couple of goons?"

As much as Judy loathed to admit it, Nick had a point. She had almost lost herself entirely to the rush of fulfilling her deepest fantasy. And it can be our little secret if you want it to be. Or you want to just do it on your own, I would totally get that."

It was almost bizarre being back to normal, even though she hadn't been inflated for all that long. When she was swollen, she felt bigger like for once she didn't have to worry about getting stepped on in the city. Being deflated left her feeling empty, almost. Everything was heavier again, even if it was only slightly. And it only made the day drag on.

What followed was the longest day in the ZPD that Judy had ever experienced, her first day on parking duty being a close second. More than once Judy had felt the urge to go to Nick and find out where he had hidden the remote so she could use it and scratch that deep-seeded itch that seemed to be growing with every passing minute. But she remained professional and dutiful, never once letting her desires take control and completing everything that was assigned to her in her typical speed.

Five o'clock rolled around and Nick did the usual after work ritual. They met at the steps of the ZPD, hopped on the same bus together, and left for home. The difference this time, however, was that Nick got off with Judy at her stop.

"So, how long have you been into this?" Nick asked as they entered the relative quiet of her apartment. Buck and Pronk were out on a date tonight, meaning they would have some privacy for a few hours.

"Is it that obvious?"

"Considering you didn't immediately freak out, you're either remarkably calm and rational all the time, which trust me you're not, or you have an interest what this thing does." Nick held up the remote, which he had kept hidden all day. "Speaking of which, when we're done tonight we should probably done some research into this thing."

"I know," Judy groaned. "And you're right. About both things. To answer your original question...I dunno. I guess always? But I didn't really know until recently."

"Well, I guess we're both novices here then," Nick undid the knot of his tie. "So, how do you want to do this then?"

Judy had been thinking about this all day. She suddenly had the power to fulfill her ultimate deviant fantasies right at her fingertips, there was so much she wanted to do with it. To narrow it all down on a place to begin was almost laughable. But she could think of one initial goal in mind.

"I want to be able to float," she announced.

"Like a balloon?"

"I was feeling lighter when I was bigger," Judy patted her now flatter stomach. "I know it's possible, even if it doesn't make physical sense. But there was also a limit I was feeling too."

"You think you'll pop?"

"I don't know," Judy admitted. "But I feel like the first step is going to be to try and see what that limit is. See how big I can get at first."

"Hope we have enough space in your apartment then."

Judy appreciated a little humor in all this as she removed her work vest in favor of slipping into something a little more comfortable for the activities they were about to do. She settled for a robe, loose enough not at all constricting so there would be plenty of room to grow without ruining her clothes. As she returned from the bathroom changed, she found Nick waiting for her with his own clothes disheveled to get comfortable. She bit her lip in anticipation of the moment of truth. How big could she get at this stage?

When Nick would finally press the button, she would grow to...

Judy knew by now that Nick was just fooling around to relieve some of the tension in the air. She couldn't deny that she was nervous too. They were friends, best friends. But this was the most intimate thing they had ever done together. There certainly was that same level of anticipation in the air. Not that Judy hadn't ever thought about it. Heck, even one of her daydreams had been something akin to this exact situation, only with a pump instead of a remote. Truthfully, she was overjoyed that she could share this with him. It felt close and personal, but he just had to ruin it by talking sometimes.

Without another second of warning, Judy was hit by the same bolt of electricity as in the alleyway.

Her paws shot to her gut, slightly growing beneath her robes, as Judy failed in hiding her surprised yelp. It was a gentler pressure than before, but it nevertheless was foreign. Almost immediately she felt as if she had eaten a very big dinner, despite having skipped the meal to jump into inflating herself. She briefly toyed with the idea of never having to eat again as a balloon before loosening her robe's belt. The speed at which she returned to the size she was before was quicker and even Nick noticed as he lowered the remote.

"Yeah," a rather kinky idea crossed Judy's mind. "Nick, could you do me a favor? Could you just hold the button down until I say stop?"

"Isn't that a little dangerous?"

To sweeten the deal, Judy shouldered off her robe and dropped it to the floor. She was still wearing her underwear and sports bra, of course, but it was the most exposure the two of them had with her each other. She wasn't blind and though her nose wasn't as powerful as a canine's, she could detect her own little things too. Try as he might, Nick couldn't hide his own arousal from her as he shifted around on his feet. And even though she felt like a pumpkin with bunny legs, Judy clearly had his attention.

"Come on," she cooed with the right tone of voice. "I want to see how big I can get before it's too much. Don't you want to see that too?"

Nick thought for a moment before holding up the remote again. "Alright. But the safe word is watermelon."

Judy trembled as the bolt struck her again, only this time it continued to splash into her like a beam of violent blue light. It was almost like it was swirling within her before growing out in all directions. She was glad to have removed her robe, doing so allowed for a front row view of the changes going on in her entire body. Not just her potbelly, though that was certainly the epicenter of it all.

She put her two paws on her stomach and pressed down into the soft fur as it swelled between her fingertips. In a matter of seconds, she had gone beyond the point of looking pregnant and into the realms of cartoonishly distorted. Her hips and thighs were also starting to see some swelling to accommodate the extra growth, making her look more like a rabbit who had gained a lot of weight in a hurry.

Internally, the feeling was ecstasy. The feeling of fullness magnified a hundredfold, yet despite that there was a deep hollow feeling that kept growing with her size. The hissing she faintly heard earlier that day was steadily increasing in volume and taking a deeper pitch as there was more of the bunny to fill out. It felt like a thousand tiny hands tugging and pulling her skin in all directions like a gentle massage. And it was all so soft. The inflation seemed to make the flesh beneath the fur doughy and stretchy, like she was slowly being molding into rubber as a deeper force within her expanded and made room for itself in her body. Patting her taunt belly, Judy knew it was air that was moving around in her.

And it wasn't content with lingering around in just her lower body and stomach.

Judy's feet curled as the air built higher and higher on top of itself, spreading to all corners of her body. It came in the form of her chest looking puffy, when moments before it had been nonexistent. Her breasts were beginning to strain the clasps of her sports bra, which below her underwear was stretching to its very limits to keep up. Three key areas on her body began a focus. Butt, belly, and boobs. But even then, the growing didn't stop there. Her arms were starting to stiffen ever so slightly, all the way down to her fingers which puffed up like she was wearing gloves. Her legs were harder to keep together as her thighs and calves thickened as the swelling muscles in her groin started to inflate too. She even lost a little flexibility with her ears as they straightened up on top of her head and plumpened with the air coursing through her body. And it wasn't just outwards she was growing.

She noticed it when her breasts had expanded a few cup sizes and her torso was starting to look like a beachball. Nick didn't look quite as tall as she was used to seeing him. Judy held her breath, she was actually starting to get taller as well as rounder.

The inflation process seemed content with keeping her in the proportions she was in as the room around her started to look just a little bit smaller, her tiny apartment seeming just a bit more cramped. The sound of Judy's heartbeat pounded away in her ear, muted only by the continually hiss of air. Her bra was really starting to dig into her torso and her panties starting to look more like a g-string. She wanted to be even bigger, but instead she felt ready to burst.

"Watermelon!"

Nick released the button as Judy fell backwards, expecting to land hard on her swollen bottom. Instead she bounce a good foot in the air before hitting the wall.

"You okay?" Nick asked, tossing the remote to the side and offering her a paw to help her up.

Judy took it, noting how puffy her paws in comparison to his. But that wasn't the only thing different when she was brought to her feet. She beamed as Nick looked down at her feet.

"You're not standing on something, are you Carrots?"

"Nope," she grinned. "How's it feel to be standing eye to eye with a bunny?"

"Mmm. Pretty good from where I'm standing. How about this then?"

Judy let out a slight squeak as Nick grabbed her by the waist and hoisted her straight into the air effortlessly. He had been able to carry her before, but in his paws Judy truly felt like she was weightless.

"How much do you think I weight?" she had to ask.

"You were, what? Forty pounds before? Half that now, if I'm any judge. You're lucky we didn't do this outside, you'd go flying away in a strong breeze."

"Maybe that's the idea," she said, cupping his face with her chubby paws. His eyes were studying her with a certain hunger in them. "What do you want to do now with your balloon, slick?"

"I can think of a few things."

It was a simple question that carried a lot of concern in her tone. Nick's eyes glanced over to the bathroom door to be greeted by a sight he should have been used to by now, but was surprising all the same. Judy's rump was swollen like a bookshelf.

"What in the...?"

"I know, right?" Judy asked, showing off her inflated rear with a slight dance. "And where's the remote? There?"

Nick looked over to the nightstand to see the remote right where he had left it in the night before.

"But, wait," he said, picking it up. "If that's here then how did you...?"

"Well, I had a bit of a thought, right? Since last night I've been feeling kind of hollow. I can't explain it, but it's just like how I feel when inflated only muted. And you know how in the cartoons the character puts their thumb in their mouth and blows? And, well..."

"Carrots, you never miss the bullpen. The minute the two of walk in late together from the same cab, everyone in the whole station is going to know about us."

It continued to floor Nick that he was going to have to be the responsible one, though he should have expected it given how Judy was known to behave when hot on a case. But the last thing he wanted to do was watch her get herself fired from the job she had worked so hard to get. Judy felt the rush of air push every part of her out in all directions as her police uniform suddenly became uncomfortably tight. She was only fortunate that Clawhauser couldn't quite see her from atop of the counter. It was only when he could grab a nearby stool that he could get the full view of her.

"Oh em goodness," he said, putting a concerned paw over his mouth. "Jude, I had no idea the doughnuts would be that fattening for a little bunny!"

"Clawhauser," Judy tried to protest before deciding against it. "...Yes. Bunnies have incredibly high metabolism. You've never seen a rabbit so much as have more than a carrot, right?"

"Yeeeeah?"

"Well, I'll burn all this off in a couple of days. We bulk up fast and run it off faster. So, don't even worry about it and just forget you saw me. Okay?"

"Of course, Judy. I'm just here to get some coffee. I'd offer you another doughnut, but...You know."

She let out a nervous laugh and forgot about the coffee cups and her whole reason for going to the kitchen in the first. She had a bigger problem to worry about.

Marching past the refrigerator, she could see a reflection of herself and determine the damage. She was about halfway between her full size when she last tried it the last night. It was clearly noticeable, though not if anyone was looking at her out of the corner of their eye. As she continued out of the kitchen, she determined that she had to get back to Nick and thus get the remote back before someone with enough knowledge of bunny biology saw her. Nick was right, she had been playing too loose and confident with these new powers. She would have to apologize when she saw him.

The real problem was getting to him without being seen.

With the bullpen meeting over, the office was in full swing with wandering eyes in every corner. She would have to go in a roundabout way to get back to him, though there was no telling where that might lead. There were some parts of the station Judy had never even been before. But on the plus side, there wouldn't be a lot of through traffic. One of those passages had to go back to the offices where Nick ways. Then again, there was always the vents. Normally, Judy might be able to squeeze into them with no problem. But she wasn't sure if she was going to get stuck or not in her current state.

Or she could just throw caution to the wind and risk the most direct route.
1253211333222232.title: The Bloated Bunny

choices: Try to figure out how to deflate.
12532113332222322.content:
There was one sure way Judy could think of to avoid being seen entirely and that was through the ventilation of the station. Plus it ran through every corner of the ZPD, all she would have to do is find the right path and she would literally be right on top of Nick. Without wasting anymore time, she ducked behind a nearby fern just as Fangmeyer and Wolfard passed her by unnoticed. She was going to have to make this quick.

Using her claws, she carefully began to unscrew the door to the shaft before her. She rolled inside as soon as she heard someone approach her.

"Omph," Judy said to herself as she squeezed deeper into the vents. "Tighter than I thought."

Given that she was mostly filled with air at this point, she felt like a balloon that was being compressed. With her hips being the largest part of her, the cramped space was causing the air to travel to other available areas where there was space. Namely her chest.

Judy blushed as she saw her typically nonexistent breasts bloomed bigger from the sudden shift in position. She could hear the fabric of her uniform stretch to hold everything together.

"I'm going to have to remember that trick for later," Judy whispered to herself.

She crawled deeper into the vents, painting a mental image for herself of the station layout. Every so often, she would pass by an opening on the floor or walls, allowing her to glance outside and judge her location. She also couldn't help but notice that the further along she went, the smaller the vents seemed to feel. Before long, she was on her paws and knees struggling to budge through until she couldn't move another inch.

"Great," she said to herself trying to retreat but finding her new assets wedged between the walls. "I'm stuck..."

By her estimates, she was only a little ways from where Nick's desk was. She could risk calling for help, but that might bring the trouble she was trying to avoid. Judy doubted Bogo would look kindly on her using the vents, inflated or otherwise. Then again, she could try to inflate herself out of the problem. Maybe that might generate enough to force to push herself through the tight spot she was in. Or she could always try her best to deflate.

Judy decided to...
12532113332222322.title: Stuck in the Vents

choices: Judy manages to deflate back to normal.
Judy deflates too much and becomes an empty husk.
Judy deflates too hard and launches herself around the vents.
125321133322223223.content:
"If only I wasn't inflated," Judy grumbled to herself. "Then I could get through no problem. Course then I wouldn't be stuck in this situation to begin with..."

Judy shifted around some more in the vents, finding that to go backwards would also be impossible given the state of her body. Her newfound chest was causing her to be boxed in as she used it as a pillow to think.

"Wait a moment," she said, sitting up slightly. "It's just air inside of me, right? So, if I can shift the air through my whole body then maybe I can get it into a place where I can expel it!"

Judy squeezed her paws around to her front and pushed with all her might. Between the pressure she was putting on herself and the tight space of the vents, it was forcing all the air in her body to a single point inside her chest. Near the lungs and throat, to be more specific. She could feel her entire torso barrel out as she felt like she was taking the deepest breath of her life. She just had to let it all out. With her cheeks puffed out, she opened her mouth and blew a massive gust of air as she felt the rest of her body begin to deflate.

It was working! But did it really?
125321133322223223.title: Flat Bunny

1253211333222232232.content:
Judy's mind became at ease as she could feel the air vent becoming less tight around her enough that she could begin to move freely again. That was when Judy realized that she couldn't close her mouth! The air was escaping too fast and she was a lot like a deflating balloon. And further it went along, the less support her own body had until the point were she was starting to collapse in on herself. It was like any structure her form had was disappearing entirely and she was no longer becoming solid anymore. Or if she was, she was feeling far flatter.

She could feel her clothes loosen as she sunk further and further into them as the air output lessened. Each passing second left her weaker and weaker.

Before long, Judy Hopps was nothing more than a pile of fur and clothes lying on the dirt vent floor.

Great, she thought to herself. Just great. Now I'm stuck in vent and the world's flattest cop!

With what muscle strength she still had, she tried to move her arms but barely got them to flap ever so slightly. It was going to be slow, but at least she could still move a tad. Though if anyone saw her like this once she got out of the vents, there was going to be no running away or hiding. That was going to have to be a risk she took as she inched towards the opening in the grate at a snail's pace. And as she was now paper thin, she could easily slip past the crack and float harmlessly down to the floor below.

As she hovered like a paper bag through the air, Judy realized she was going to land on someone. And that someone was...
1253211333222232232.title: Deflated Judy

choices: Store her in the locker for now as punishment, but suffer for it later.
Go to the locker to reinflate her and hope no one sees them.
Try blowing her up here with a kiss.
12532113332222322321.content:
Judy was having some good luck at last as she fluttered down on top of a familiar fox just as he was sitting down at his desk. Nick gawked at what felt like a large piece of paper covering his head before he removed it only to find himself staring down at a very flat version of Judy.

"Carrots!?"

Judy wished that she could talk, but given all the air had escaped her body she lacked the ability to speak. She could only just give Nick a nervous smile as he sighed and shook his head. It didn't take much for him to put two and two together.

"You were messing around with your powers, weren't you?"

Judy found that she could only communicate with him through facial gestures for now. She just rolled her eyes.

"Well, I hope that it's a little bit of a lesson for you. I can't believe I have to be the responsible one here when we're at work."

He tugged at her body a little bit. It was like all the air had escaped out of her, leaving her as nothing more than a hollow suit. Though she was still sentient if her annoyed reactions to him messing with her was any clue. Nick had a mind to keep her like this for the rest of the day and just tell Bogo that she had gone home sick. He could just roll up Judy like a map and store her in his locker until end of day, where she couldn't cause more trouble.

Though Nick supposed he should try and bring her back to normal unless he wanted an earful later. The problem was that the inflator gun was also in his locker, where it could be kept safe. He would have to go down there with her and hope no one noticed. Or maybe there was another way to reinflate Judy. If her body was behaving like a deflated balloon maybe he could blow her up again with a special kind of kiss. There was no one in the offices they were in right now and they could avoid being seen.

Nick thought for a moment before deciding...
12532113332222322321.title: Found by Nick

choices: They're able to meet in private over lunch.
They're busy all day and have to wait till after hours.
They get pulled into a big crime happening during work.
125321133322223223213.content:
Given that these new physics with Judy basically made her into a cartoon, Nick wondered if the same might apply to a number of other things. He raised her up for a moment before taking a deep breath and kissing her on the lips. Judy was caught somewhat off guard by the public display of affection, even if they had stepped all over that boundary the whole night before with each other. But when she could feel Nick's air traveling down her throat, she understood what he was trying to do.

And strangely enough, it started to work.

Sure, it took more than a few deep breaths to get the process going, but before long Judy could start to feel her fingers and toes again. It was like she was some pool toy as she felt her torso widen again to be more solid. Despite the air coursing through her body, she felt a bit like her old self again as Nick began to lower her to the floor to stand.

When he was finished, the two stood in an embrace, the kiss transforming into a real kiss before they slowly broke away from each other.

"There," said Nick. "Now, no more getting into trouble, okay?"

"I didn't even mean to," Judy replied with a shy smile. "Clawhauser got the jump on me and caused me to blow up."

"Hmm. That could be quite problematic, especially on the job. The last thing we need is to be chasing a criminal only for you to get a cause of the hiccups and float away."

"That won't happen!" Judy said with only some certainty.

"Well, we need to get this under control then, Carrots. Not now but maybe at lunch or after work. We need to figure out exactly what this new power is all about. And how far it can go."

Though Judy agreed with him and regretted having put Nick through so much trouble already, secretly she was kind of excited. This was the sort of thing she only imagined would happen to her. Now that it was a reality, it was all she could do to not try everything at once, just like her favorite pop song. But Nick was right, they had to know what they were dealing with. She just had to hope that nothing too interesting would happen between now and the time for a private break. For once, Judy wished for a quiet day at work.
125321133322223223213.title: Back to Normal, for Now

choices: Nick becomes a perfect clone of Judy, down to her height and shape.
Nick keeps Judy's body shape but stretches her out to his own height.
1253211333222232232131.content:
Lucky for Judy, the pair were gifted with a relatively quiet day of filing reports and playing catch up. There wasn't even a lost child they had to return to their mother. Under normal circumstances, Judy would be bored to tears. But today, she had plenty of things going on in her bunny brain to keep her busy. Specifically, what she was going to do with Nick as soon as lunch rolled around.

Noon came and with it, lunch. Instead of heading out to their usual spot in Sahara for Bug Burga, they instead opted to order to the station and have lunch in the quiet of the rooftop. Nick was sure to close the door behind them and block it with a sizeable rock, though he was sure no one would bother looking up here for them.

"So," Nick, clapping his paws together. "Shall we have lunch first or--"

He was interrupted by the sharpness of bunny teeth as Judy jumped into his arms in a passionate kiss. One Nick was all too happy to reciprocate.

"...Does the play come first?" Nick asked with a smile when she was done.

"I've had this idea since you reinflated me," Judy said. "But it's a little weird."

"Carrots, I think we're beyond a little weird at this point."

"My body doesn't behave like it normally does anymore," Judy explained. "Like, right now, I feel normal but I also know in the back of my mind that I could let all my air out with one big breath and go back to being flat. It's almost like my internal organs have all been replaced since last night."

Nick suddenly had a nervous look about him.

"Relax," Judy said raising her paws to calm him down. "I'm the one who chose this and I'm fine with it. It's really cool. But, it also got me thinking, if I'm an empty husk does that mean I can be filled with things other than air."

"You mean like water?"

Judy blushed. "Water would be fun...But I was thinking what might happen if you wore me like a suit."

"A suit?"

"Right. So, what I was going to do is deflate myself again and you can just...Climb in through my mouth and we can see what happens. Does that sound like fun?"

"I dunno, Carrots. You being in that state leaves you very vulnerable. I know cartoon logic seems to apply with you now, but this feels like a stretch."

"That's the idea," Judy winked at him as she put her paws to waist in preparation to squeeze. "Let's just try and see what happens. I promise, this will be fun."

Nick was left with no time to reject as he was taken aback by a massive gust of wind coming from Judy's mouth. He stood dumbfounded as his best friend and partner began to shrivel up and fold in on herself, starting with her legs and working its way up. Nick had to reach out and grab her by the deflated wrist before she blew away in the wind.

"I know my last name is Wilde," he said to the grinning bunny skinsuit. "But I'm starting to think that's a more appropriate title for you, Carrots."

Nick sighed as he held out the remains of Judy. Like before, her fur was stretching like it was made of rubber underneath. It felt almost like he could, in fact, squeeze himself inside of her. But who knows what kind of crazy thing might happen there. As Nick began to strip to his boxers, he took a deep breath and made the leap.

What would happen to Nick and Judy when he wore her like a suit?
1253211333222232232131.title: The Judy Suit

choices: Judy wants to try firing the remote at them while they're like this.
They're called to duty before they can get Nick out.
They're able to separate, but Nick's body has been altered.
12532113332222322321311.content:
Of all the strange situations Nick had found himself in since meeting Judy Hopps, this was definitely in the top five. Judy didn't even feel like a living being anymore, just a lifeless suit for him to wear. Taking once step inside her gaping mouth, however, Nick could feel that this wasn't a simple empty shell like a Howloween costume. Instead, he could feel a warmth like he was entering something that was living and breathing. It was nice to know his partner hadn't completely turned into an inanimate object.

As he wiggled his much larger foot to find the bottom, Nick began to feel a strange compression feeling. Judy certainly had some large feet as a rabbit, but his were most certainly bigger and bulkier than hers were, enough that he expected to stretch her legs with his decent. Instead, from the outside, there didn't appear to be any visible distortion.

"I guess this might work after all," he commented as he brought his other foot inside.

Sure enough, both legs fit snugly in their respective holes with it looking like Judy's normal pair of legs from Nick's perspective. He walked around a bit, adjusting to the fact that his feet had apparently shrunk up to his knees. His legs were also starting to dwindle to match Judy's exact body shape while Judy's face stared up at him around his waist. It looked almost comical, like she was a snake eating a much larger prey. Or if Nick was putting on a very realistic looking Judy onesie. From his angle, it looked like Judy was smiling and saying told you so.

"I can admit when I'm wrong, Carrots. Let's just finish this up first. I don't know how I'm supposed to fit in here."

The answer was that his body was supposed to be compressed and squished into Judy's mold. The "Judy suit" had absolutely no give to it, despite looking like elastic. Nick could feel his spine fold like an accordion as he pulled the disguise up higher and higher, making sure to tuck his tail in first. While the hips of the suit certainly offered plenty of room, Nick had a much longer torso than Judy did. As he squeezed himself in through the rabbit's mouth, he found it getting tighter and tighter, while the rooftop around him seemed to be getting bigger and bigger. He grunted, it was like someone was trying to squeeze him into a narrowing tube.

It got harder trying to fit his arms into the right spots, or more specifically his paws into the thin fingers where Judy's own would be. More and more, Nick felt like toothpaste trying to be pushed back into its tube. When he was sure something was going to snap as he slipped his other arm into Judy's mouth, he felt something in his own body snap as he suddenly got a whole lot smaller. His entire perspective had just dropped over a foot in height, which when you were already the size of a fox that was a big deal. That's when he realized that he was officially Judy's height, minus her long ears.

"Wow," he had to say, adjusting to the vertigo. "I never realized just how short you were before, Carrots."

His heights wasn't the only that had altered. Walking around for a bit, Nick recognized that there was a little more 'omph' to his hips. That's when he looked down and saw that his lanky body had been modeled into the curvaceous shape of Judy's distinctly female one. He now had the waist and the butt to match her, as well as the tail which he was able to wiggle around by flexing his own. There was really only their heads as a difference between them.

With nothing else left to do, Nick grabbed Judy's gaping mouth around his neck and hoisted it up over his snout. This proved challenging in its own right, as he tried to align her eyes with his. Nick's fox muzzle was quite long compared to Judy's and he could feel it scrunch up as the "mask" molded his face. All the extra mass traveled up to his ears, much in the way it had to his hips prior. Suddenly, he could hear a lot better as he developed a pair of tall rabbit ears. The rest of him aligned into place as Judy's buck teeth pushed over Nick's sharp canine ones. Standing where he had just moments prior was the perfect clone of Judy Hopps, down to the last hair.

"This is just unreal," Nick said in a voice that was distinctly his own.

"I told you it would work," he found that his mouth moved by itself, speaking exactly in Judy's voice.

"Wait, Carrots, you're still here?"

"Of course I am! You're only inside me and controlling how I move. But at least I can talk now. Safe to say if you ever needed to hide from the Chief, you could go posing as me for a few hours."

Nick let out a nervous laugh, wondering what exactly this new development meant. These powers of Judy seemed to be growing and ever changing. Who was to say what would happen if they were left unchecked, as fun as it was to see things from her perspective for a change.

Nick eyed around the rooftop, wondering what they should do next. He should really climb out of Judy before someone saw them, though Judy didn't seem to be in any hurry for that yet. He had to wonder what had become of his own body during all this. Surely being compressed into a rabbit shape wasn't any good for him. Not to mention the remote was just in sight of them, sticking out of his empty pants pocket on the ground. Nick had a strong desire to climb out of Judy before something wrong happened. This was a police station and an emergency could happen at any moment.

What happened next was...

"Alright," Nick announced in his own voice. "This was fun but it's starting to feel a little cramped in here."

"Aw, alright."

Nick sighed in relief. Though Judy was being pushy, even she knew that they were treading in uncharted territory here in public where they could get caught and in a lot of trouble. Who knew what someone might say if they caught them like this? Bogo would certainly separate them as partners, after they sent Judy to a local scientist to study what was going with her body. Best just to separate now and they could play with this later. Working backwards, Nick began to peel the "mask" he was wearing off until he could expose his true face underneath.

~

Through a careful process of removing the "Judy suit" and reinflating her back to normal, the two of them could study what had become of Nick after scrunching himself up into her body.

Quite simply, he looked like an exact clone of Judy save for his fur color, his eyes, and his voice. It was almost as if by wearing her, he had molded his own body into her shape. Even his gender had swapped, much to his horror. And he wasn't exactly thrilled to be pint-sized, though Judy certainly enjoyed teasing him now that they could see eye to eye.

"Laugh it up, Carrots," he growled, crossing his arms. "At least you have clothes that fit."

Nick's old uniform was doing a poor job of covering him up. He was sure to make a strange sight, let alone few people ever saw an orange bunny before. Or was he still a fox, only just in the shape of a bunny? It was hard to tell with even his fangs having been reformed into buck teeth. He most certainly didn't like being so short. And he especially didn't like having a woman's body, with the butt to match.

"Sorry," Judy replied, covering her mouth. "We'll fix this somehow."

"How? I don't think I'm going to exactly be undercover if I'm a neon orange rabbit, Carrots."

"Well, maybe I can go out and get some fur dyer to paint you grey and white, like me. Then I can grab you one of my uniforms and I can have my own clone. Or maybe you can go back to wearing me until we can find a solution, at least so you can hide for now. Or maybe we can find someone else we can turn into a suit so you can get a bigger body, if that's how this works. I have a feeling we can turn someone into a suit if we hold down the minus button."

Nick couldn't believe Judy was suggesting hijacking someone's body like that, but he had to admit the thought had crossed his mind. Besides, they would make things right once they solved their own problems. He sighed and decided to...

1253211333222232232131131.content:
"The last thing we need is another incident making this worse," Nick said. "So no suiting anyone. And no more going inside you. I guess I'll pose as you until we can meet up tonight to figure this out."

"Sounds like a plan," Judy chirped. "Hang on. Let me go to the undercover department and go get some supplies."

Nick wasn't left waiting as Judy sprinted down the roof and returned in roughly five minutes with all sorts of supplies.

The first was one of her spare uniforms, with everything from the utility belt to some of her extra underwear. Nick blushed a little at the thought of her going all out like that. There were some cans of fur dye, stuff he had seen a few of the other undercover cops using when they needed a disguise. Nick was ordered to stand still and naked as Judy sprayed him all the way down with the same grey fur color that she sported. His foxy orange glow faded away in an instant as Judy then brought out the can of white spare to highlight his chest, paws, tail, and snout until the pattern of fur matched her own.

"Well," Nick said as the dye dried rather quickly. "I guess I was always kind of curious to give undercover work a shot, just not quite like this. What's that other stuff?"

Judy held up a box and opened it to reveal a violet colored lens. "It's a lens that can color your eyes the same shade as mine."

"Ugh, I hate contact lens," Nick commented as he plopped the first one into place.

As he put the second one in, he blinked a few times as Judy held up her camera. On the screen was a perfect, naked version of herself from everything down to the fur and eye color.

"Wow," Nick said. "As long as I don't say a word, no one is going to know the difference."

"About that..."

Judy held up another box and opened it to reveal something that looked almost like a retainer.

"What the heck is that?"

"A voice changer," Judy said as she played with a small knob. "Just fit it on the roof of your mouth and it should alter your voice to sound like me. Try it."

Nick opened his mouth and moved the device past his new buckteeth before it settled quite comfortably on the top of his mouth as his tongue pushed it into place. The voice changer seemed to adjust to the size of his mouth before locking into place. Nick cleared his throat and asked.

"Does it work," he said a familiar shrill female voice before he clasped his throat. "Woah...I sound just like you!"

"Close enough. It comes with over a thousand different tones and tenures, just in case we need to."

"I can't believe the R&D guys would let you walk out with it."

"They didn't. We're just 'borrowing' it until we can fix this mess."

Nick was about to protest when he suddenly realized he was still very naked on the rooftop of the ZPD building. Judy handed him her spare uniform, which he swiftly slipped into. Before long, there were two perfect Officer Hopps staring at each other.

"Well, Officer Hopps," said Judy. "Shall we get to work?"

"Let's, Officer Hopps," replied Nick. "Though don't let anyone see us in the same place together."

Judy agreed and the two of them split up to begin their work on opposite ends of the building. Nick could do his own paper work in the boiler room, so he gathered it off his desk while Judy remained in her own cubicle. Nick supposed it could be quite fun to pose as someone else, for a change. And being seen as a bunny was earning him quite a lot more warmer looks than he ever received as a fox. Though that might have also had to do with being female.

What could go wrong with having two Judys running around the ZPD?

They were briefest on the way there as a familiar name came up during the talks.

"That's right," Bogo said in the back of the armor van. "Recently there have been some complaints about malfunctioning products from this company. Further digging revealed that there has never been a company under that name in the Zootopia registry of business. "We suspect this is all a front for some drugs or illegal substances," Bogo said. "And we have a warrant from the mayor. He doesn't want any funny business any more after the Nighthowler incident."

Judy and Nick shared a concerned look with each other. They knew perfectly well that the devices were in fact legitimate. Perhaps people had been purchasing them without knowing what they did. But they couldn't tell Bogo that without knowing everything so they kept quiet for now.

"Right then," Bogo said as they stepped out from the van with the rest of the squad. "This will be a short rush in and arresting on whoever we find inside. Let's be quick and get this done before anyone gets hurt."

1311.content:
One of the few breaks Judy Hopps permitted for herself during the day came in the form of climbing up to the roof of her apartment building and looking over the night sky of Zootopia. After so many years of hoping and wishing she might see the city for herself, it was always like a dream to actually see the city with her own eyes from a higher plane and there were few better sights than the rooftop of a building.

From her modest little den in downtown Savannah, the sky opened up to her. Though there were less stars in the sky than there were on the farm, she still found it all very beautiful. In fact, she was actually feeling a little guilty.

Nick had upset Chief Bogo, again. For his punishment, he was sentenced to working late hours. He was having a bad week in general with missing his quota on parking tickets and throwing out his back during a chase of a suspect. Sometimes Judy wondered if Nick was actually enjoying his life as a police officer or if he would do it all over again.

As she looked up at the sky, a streak of light flashed overhead and she jumped to her feet.

"A shooting star!"

Ever the considerate bunny, she crossed her paws in prayer and said her wish.

"I wish that my friend would have the life he's always wanted."

Though she said those words, she couldn't have any idea what they would truly mean. And though Judy didn't believe in magic, something strange was at work as the star would grant her wish.

Just not in the way she intended.

The wish would involve...

155311.content:
"Are you sure you okay, Judy?" asked her partner "Yes, for the last time Nick, the doctors couldn't find anything wrong", replied the exasperated bunny. "They pumped you full of drugs, Judy, of course I'd be worried." Judy appreciated his concern, but she was running out of patience. "I'll be alright, Nick" "Okay, Carrots, but if you need me you know where i'm at."

Judy decided to return to her apartment after Chief Bogo gave her sometime off after the incident. She objected, but he insisted saying, "It would do no good to have one of my officers at anything less than their best."

At her apartment she is overcome by an intense heat and wooziness. Judy considered calling Nick but didn't want to worry him. After the feeling faded she saw her reflection. A patch of fur near the injection site had changed into a rusty red color. If she had been fully alert she would have been worried, but she felt so tired. She decided to lay down and she drifted off to sleep.

During her restless night, her dreams were filled with Bellwether's maniacal laughter.

1553111.content:
Judy woke up itching all over and with a throbbing pain in her mouth. She groaned in pain and slowly got out of bed.
She stumbled into her bathroom to find why her teeth were hurting. To her horror a few of her teeth fell out, revealing several sharp teeth suited for a predator. She also noticed that large patches of her fur had changed color.

She questioned why this was happening, but her panic made it impossible. Judy needed to calm her mind to figure this out, but before she could her doorbell rang.
Her body changes made her self-conscious. She couldn't let anyone see her.

She heard Nick's familiar voice saying, "Carrots, I came to see how you're doing." Judy tried to pretend she wasn't there, but after several minutes of silence she knew he was worried, worried enough to use her name. "Judy, I know you're in there, please open the door."

Judy decided that she had to face him eventually, so she opened the door.

"Hey, Carrots, why did you..., oh" Nick trailed off when he noticed her appearance.
The red color her fur took looked exactly like his. He filled it away for now and yelled "Judy, I told you something would happen. The Doctors admitted they didn't know what was injected into you." "I know, I know. I didn't want you to worry Nick," the distressed rabbit shouted back baring her new teeth. "Were friends, of course I'm worried, especially when you seem to be changing, but we need to know what's going on."

"Do you remember anything from the attack?", asked the fox. "I'll try to, but it's fuzzy. Wait. one of them said something. I think it was a name. It was familiar. Wait, I remember. It was Bellwether! We need to interrogate her," Judy exclaimed.

"No, we need to get you to a hospital first." Judy wanted to complain, but an intense pain overtook her. Her bones felt like they were on fire.

"Miss Hopps, upon further analysis we were able to determine you were injected with a modified virus. It's changing your genetic structure. To put it bluntly, your going to become a fox." Judy was desperate to hear that this was a nightmare she would wake up from.
Nick quipped, "On the bright side you'll be as handsome as me." Judy wasn't in the mood. She couldn't wrap her mind around her situation.

The doctor made a request, "Mr. Wilde, Normally you wouldn't be here, but since you're a fox you're in the best position to help her."

Their attention shifted back Judy when she started screaming in pain, "my bones feel like they're breaking." Her vitals spiked on the monitor. The doctor to Nick to leave immediately.

The last Nick heard from the doctor was, "Get the sedative. Get her vitals under control."
