Her tail was long and bushy with a black tip. She had a muzzle with a black snout. Her senses were different. Judy was almost indistinguishable from other foxes.

The emotions caught up with her and she began to sob. Fortunately Nick was there to comfort her, she heard him say, "Judy I'm here. I don't have experience with full-body transformations, but I do know how to be a fox." He resolved to help her accept her new self.

155321.content:
What sort of special assignment awaits then for our favorite bunny cop?

What if she was the prime candidate for testing a brand new disguise tool for deep undercover work?

Or perhaps what if she was chosen for an investigation case deep in Little Rodentia and she needs to take a serum to shrink down to size in order to get involved with the case?

Or maybe something else entirely?
155321.title: Special Assignment for Judy

choices: Causes cells to constrict, allowing someone to shrink.
Contains nanobots which can manipulate a person's body.
Allows for Judy to enter a shrinking chamber.
1553212.content:
Judy had read the report several times already and she still didn't believe what was being asked of her. Not until she was standing eye to eye with a lady giraffe after knocking on the door to the laboratory. She was a perfectly normal looking giraffe too, with all the right proportions and everything. She just was wearing a lab coat that looked much to big on her and she didn't even come up to Judy's ears in height...

"Officer Hopps!" the giraffe said with more enthusiasm than even Judy was known for giving. "Welcome to ZR&D! I'm Doctor Hightower, though as you can see, not quite so high anymore!"

"I, uh, yeah," Judy shook her head to remember her manners and took the giraffe's offered hoof. "Pleased to, uh, meet you. I guess it's safe to say that the briefing wasn't a lie?"

"Indeed! I'm sure you've been told everything already. Top secret and all that."

Judy had indeed, though she had admittedly thought the Chief's idea was his attempt at a joke.

The Big family had been spreading its reach across Zootopia following Bellwether's arrest in an attempt to get a bigger hold with the vacuum of power in disarray. Even with her own ties to the family, Judy couldn't convince Mister Big to back down on this matter. She was a cop, after all, and he was a mobster. Though the shrew was smart. Indeed of expanding his influence in catnip and other drugs using his giant polar bears when the city was already nervous about preds, this time he was using a smaller approach.

"We need someone inside Little Rodentia," Judy explained as she walked with the shrunken giraffe. "Someone with police training and that we can trust. Unfortunately, Little Rodentia is something of a tricky place for any of our...Bigger guys to be."

"That's where I can come in," Doctor Hightower sounded positively thrilled. "I had been telling Mayor Lionheart for years now that shrinking technology would solve so many of the city's housing and food problems what with such a diverse array of citizens in Zootopia. I think he just gave me a grant to look good in the science crowd for votes."

"Yeah, he does that..."

"Well, I'm sure I've already proven the fruits of my labor. I find I save a bundle being rabbit sized on rent and groceries!"

"But I will be able to grow back to normal...Right?"

"Of course!" replied the giraffe as she climbed up to a much larger stool to the computer. "It's all perfectly safe and I've been on every end of the spectrum just to be sure you're no test bunny. Who knows? Maybe when this is all done, I could bump you up a bit so you don't get picked on as much."

Judy could only imagine the look on Nick's face if she suddenly walked into work bigger than he was. "We'll see about that..."

"Indeed, let's begin then shall we?" the doctor began typing into her computer. "How tall are you exactly in centimeters?"

"81.3." Judy had been asked to measure herself before hand.

"And without the ears?"

"60.5."

The talks of size measurements continued as Judy fidgeted nervously in place. It slowly occurred to her that this was real. She was really going to be shrunk down to the size of a mouse to infiltrate Mister Big's operation. It was almost like science fiction. Mammals didn't just shrink It was bizarre and...Kind of exciting.

The doctor finished up her notes and fiddled with a machine on her desk that hummed. Judy spied a green liquid filling a small glass vial before Hightower produced a syringe and sucked out an exact amount, measuring twice before nodding to herself.

"Slid up your arm, please."

Judy did as commanded as the giraffe hopped onto the floor and injected her with the substance. Judy winced for a moment before she felt a cooling sensation run through her veins.

"Now the goal is to bring you to about 15 centimeters," explained the doctor. "The height of an average rat. But this process isn't an exact science yet, so you may be a little over or under."

"How will this work, exactly?" Judy asked, rubbing at the injection spot.

"Well, you see, that serum I just injected you with..."
1553212.title: The Shrink Serum

choices: Judy has remained exactly the same.
15532121.content:
"...Causes cells to constrict, allowing someone to shrink," explained the stunted doctor. "You see, there's actually a fish somewhere in the eastern seas that shrinks itself to hide from predators. It does this by releasing a special hormone that tells the body 'you need to shrink now' and there we go. It's also similar to how if you keep a goldfish in a larger bowl, it will grow bigger than if you keep it in a tiny tank."

"I guess that makes sense," Judy replied as there was a cold feeling running through her veins now. "I feel funny..."

"That's the serum working its way through your body. It doesn't happen all at once, you see. It needs some time to spread to every corner, so it will take about a week to leave your system. In the meantime, I recommend taking it easy before then. Like I said, this is not an exact science. You may end up bigger or smaller than intended. From there, I will distill the growth serum to bring you back to normal."

"Got it."

"And I do mean take it easy! I've heard about your antic from Chief Bogo himself. Your body is going to be going through some drastic changes and you might be in danger of wearing yourself out."

~

And with that, Nick was along to pick Judy up from the laboratory shortly after Judy had been discharged with a few vitamins to keep up her body's strength during the process. Nick brought his sense of humor with him.

"So, this is actually legitimate?" he asked. "You don't look any shorter, Carrots."

"She said it should take a week and I should measure myself in an hour to confirm that it's working. Then it's just a matter of waiting a week if all goes well."

"That's it? Sounds all too easy."

"Well, the hard part is going to be going undercover once I'm there. Don't suppose Finnick has any disguises I could use to pretend to be a mouse?"

"Hah, I'm sure we'll come up with something."

Judy was glad Nick was there as she could feel the serum working its way through her body. It was a cold sensation that burned at her veins, it was hard to know if that was normal or not. If she was going to be cut to a fourth of her size, it was nice to know she at least hard her partner at her back.

Bogo allowed for Judy to go straight home for the rest of the day with her being on desk duty until she couldn't be working. She was already starting to feel a little tired. By the time they arrived back at her apartment, it had been an hour since the injection. Nick helped Judy set up her tape measurer against the wall to discover that...
15532121.title: A Slow Process

choices: A few centimeters, but she also looks younger too.
155321211.content:
Nick and Judy had measured her against her wall beforehand earlier that day, marking her height on the wall with a pencil. Judy lined up in the same spot as Nick got out the tape measurer and traced the top of her head. She watched his eyes widen in surprise as he stepped with the number.

"59.4 centimeters."

"No way," Judy said as she turned around to face the markings.

Sure enough, the fresh etched line was just a hair shorter than the one they drawn that morning. Judy had heard of the spine decompressing over the course of the day before, but this was different. Now that she really focused, she could feel that her clothes felt slightly bigger. Her uniform, which was normally skintight and hugged her body perfectly was now a little bit loose in some areas. And there was a weird tingle running through her veins. Followed by the itch of excitement.

"This is amazing," she said, going to the closet.

"You're taking this a lot better than I would, Carrots," Nick said as he watched her dig through a box. "I'd be freaking out at the prospect of shrinking away into nothing."

"It doesn't work like that," Judy answered. "And the doctor said it can easily be reversed at any time. So, might as well enjoy it while I can!"

She pulled out some clothes sent from home. Judy had asked her parents ahead of time to send her a bunch of old outfits from all her sisters of various ages, she didn't tell them that she would be the one wearing. After all, didn't need them freaking out over this latest new mission. It was just nice to be prepared for being a various sizes she hadn't been since she was a kid as she pulled out a small dress meant for a bunny two years old.

"We should get to work though," Judy said. "Planning who I'm going to have to investigate when the real mission begins."

"Plan? Bogo said you should take the day off. Don't you feel tired? You just shrunk over a centimeters, Carrots."

"I feel fine, Nick," Judy shooed away his concern. "Come on, I'd like to get this done before I'm too small to hold a pencil."

And so the two of them got to work mapping out Judy's apartment into her new workspace and then set to work on getting leads Judy could infiltrate once mouse sized. They worked through the morning and into the afternoon. Before long it was approaching dinner as their stomach grumbled.

Judy had been sitting in her chair the whole time, but she was certain she had shrunk some more. Her uniform was now rather limp on her as she stood up to approach the wall for a measurement before the pair went out to get some dinner. They discovered over the course of the first day, she had shrunk...
155321211.title: The Start of Shrinking

choices: Judy experiences a large shrink spurt.
Judy starts to grow back to normal size.
1553212111.content:
"57.3 centimeters," Nick said as he removed his pencil from the wall. "See for yourself."

"No way!"

Judy looked up at the line on the wall and gasped. The line from that afternoon now seemed so much further away than before as it now stretched high above the top of her head. And the line showing her original height she now had to stand up on her tippy toes to reach. It occurred to her that this was really happening. Her body was getting smaller and smaller and her clothes only proved it. Her once skintight suit was now beginning to feel quite limp over her neck and her gloves were starting to slip off her paws. She felt more like a kit wearing her parent's clothes than an actual police officer.

Standing on her toes, however, had left her with a strange sense of vertigo as she stumbled backwards straight into Nick's arms.

"Careful now, Carrots."

Everything in her room was now starting to feel just a tiny bit bigger. Three centimeters in total for a day wasn't a lot in the grand scheme of heights, but it was a lot when your normal height was around sixty centimeters. Five percent. Judy Hopps was now five percent smaller than she had been that morning. And that meant everything around her felt five percent bigger, no matter how much she tried to convince her brain that it was actually her getting smaller. Her clothes felt bigger. Her chair felt bigger. Even Nick, who had always been taller than her at around 80 centimeters, felt bigger. Though he was very delicate in how he held her, even moreso than usual.

"I'm sorry," Judy apologized as she got to her own feet. "It's just...Wow. I haven't been this short since...High school, at least."

"Well, you are starting to look smaller now, I'll admit. Don't you think this is a good time to take your vitamins like the doctor ordered?"

"In a minute, I just had an idea."

Judy hopped over to the closet, letting her much-too-large belt and boots fall to the floor before searching around for a specific pair of clothes she had requested from her parents. With them in paw, she then entered the bathroom to change in privacy. She stepped out of her uniform with the thought that one day, she might be able to fill it completely again as she turned to her new outfit.

"How do I look?" Judy said as she stepped out of the bathroom fully changed.

She was wearing a pair of jeans and T-shirt from her freshman year of high school. And though they were still a little tight on her, they were a much better fit than her uniform.

"Young," Nick admitted with his arms crossed. "Funny what a change in wardrobe can do."

"You're one to talk with your gaudy shirts, slick."

"That's enough of that. It's time to take your vitamins, little lady."

Normally, Judy might chastise Nick for calling her little. But knowing now that her height was something she could control, it wasn't so bad. In fact, the prospect of getting even smaller around Nick was...A little exciting, though Judy shook that thought off and accepted the vitamins from Nick before swallowing. Even these were starting to feel a little bigger in her mouth.

"So then," Nick said. "Dinner?"

"Yes please."

Dinner would be interesting though as the two made their way downtown towards their usual favorite spot, a nice place that catered to both predators and prey equally. Though things would make it so it wasn't a completely quiet dinner as during the meal...
1553212111.title: A Couple off the Top

choices: A higher, more dangerous, dose of the serum.
A dose from a shrinking chamber.
Repetitive doses of the serum to keep Judy small.
15532121112.content:
It was about when Judy received her dish did she realize something was wrong. As the dinner of steamed carrots over onions was pushed out in front of her, Judy had to undo the top button of her jeans to sit comfortably when she had been fine when first sitting down. By the time dinner was finished, her T-shirt was starting to expose her stomach a little.

As always, Nick was able to sense something was wrong.

"You alright, Carrots?"

As Judy looked down at herself, she could see that there was some visible discomfort with wearing the clothes she was. It was almost as if they had shrunk on her.

"No," she said with a frown. "I think I need to go see the doctor."

~

"Officer Hopps," said Hightower. "What a pleasant surprise. What brings you to my lab at this hour?"

The shrunken giraffe doctor had remained the same size as that morning, but Nick hadn't seen her yet. He did a double take at the normally towering mammal who was now shorter than he was and muttered something under his breath while Judy did the talking.

"Sorry for disturbing you so late at night, doctor."

"Nonsense! Being at this height means the usual amount of coffee I drink has a rather pronounced effect on me. I'll be up all night. How goes the progression with the serum?"

"Well, that's just it Doctor Hightower. The serum was working. I had lost about five percent of my height before we went out for dinner. And then...I just starting growing back."

"Growing back," Hightower blinked a few times before shaking her head. "Nonsense. The serum should slowly run its course over the week and your body should settle at fifteen centimeters, plus or minus two for margin of error."

"Well, that didn't happen and I'm back to normal height now."

"Preposterous. Come here, step on this scale."

Judy did as was told as the shrunken giraffe struggled with the measuring scale, getting it even with Judy's head.

"You see? You are precisely 60.5 centimeters tall. And according to your record from this morning..."

Hightower crawled up her chair and gathered Judy's folder left there. As she started flipping through it, her face sunk.

"...You were precisely 60.5 centimeters before beginning the procedure."

Judy frowned. She had been all sorts of excited when this was all going according to plan and the doctor had some form of control. But now it felt like they were playing with something a little dangerous as Hightower leapt onto the floor and began pacing.

"How bizarre. Whenever I've tested it on myself, the process was perfect. How could this be?"

"Maybe it has something to do with her biology?" Nick asked from the corner of the office. "After all, rabbits are different from giraffe."

"Perhaps," Hightower said, examining Judy a little closer. "Your body appears to be fighting off the serum entirely though, rejecting the effects and returning you back to your normal size. It's dispelling the serum to boot."

"What does that mean then?"

"Well, I can find out. If you give me several months, I can do enough research with some helpful samples from you to--"

"Several months?" Judy squeaked. "Doctor, our plan for this operation is in a week! It could take years before another opportunity presents itself with Mister Big."

"In that case, then I suppose I can propose alternatives. Though I should warn you, they will be dangerous and untested. I won't say it will be impossible to return you to normal. Nothing is impossible in Zootopia, after all. But we're venturing into unknown territory here. I can't make any promises that it will be a flawless experiment."

Judy gulped. "What do you have in mind then?"

"Well, let's see here..."
15532121112.title: A Problem with the Serum

choices: Judy shrinks with each dose, as planned.
Judy's body can produce the serum naturally now.
155321211123.content:
"Here's what I propose," Doctor Hightower said as she went to her desk. "Since it's clear that Officer Hopps' body is rejecting the drug but the initial effects of the serum are still working, what if we simply increased the number of does she had to take. About how long would you say did it take for the shrinking effects to wear off?"

Nick and Judy glanced at each other before she answered her. "From morning till evening, so about eight hours."

"Eight hours with about five percent of your initial height," Hightower muttered to herself as she hopped up onto her computer and began typing at the oversized keyboard.

Judy watched a series of mathematical equations flash across the screen with super quick calculations being done to determine how much serum she would need. There was a generated graphic of a rabbit her size, only to watch it slowly shrink in eight hour increments over the course of a week until she was about 15 centimeters tall. Then Hightower pushed a button which caused a machine next to her computer to whirl before it began to fill up a series of twenty or so syringes.

"Now then," Hightower as she collected the serums in a plastic bag. "I want you to take one of these every eight hours, every time your body starts to grow back. In theory, we can fight the growth effect your body has a result."

"Isn't that dangerous?" Nick asked. "That many drugs being pumped into her body?"

"It is. But as you said, there's no other choice for your mission, I'm afraid. I'm sorry, but this is the best I can do without further research. I don't know what will happen exactly. In theory, you should keep shrinking with every dose and grow back when you stop taking it. It's also possible your body may adapt to the serum and start producing it naturally. Or maybe you'll simply become immune to it. Who can say? The choice is up to you, Officer Hopps."

Hightower handed Judy the plastic bag.

"I will say," Hightower admitted. "That I would like for you to return here tomorrow if you decide to go through with it. That will allow me to observe the effects."

"What do you say, Carrots?" asked Nick. "I wouldn't do it but..."

"But we don't have a choice," Judy said, clutching the bag which contained the drug which might decide her fate. "I'll do it."

"Splendid. Record your results before you begin. You may wish to wait until going to sleep, that should span the whole eight hours. I'm very curious to see what the outcome will be."

Little did any of them know, that outcome would be...
155321211123.title: Repetitive Doses

choices: A growth serum to make himself bigger.
A shrink serum to make his lady friend more his size.
Nick to get shrunk to his size, for a day.
15532121113.content:
No one seemed to be giving the pair much mind, despite Judy's drop in height. True, she was never the largest rabbit to begin with and the serum was only making her shorter, but no would blink an eye at a tiny bunny. And there was a bigger surprise that came following dinner being served to her. The jeans she had been wearing now had a slight give to them around her belly.

"Excuse me a moment," she said to Nick before she could eat her steamed carrots and brussel sprouts.

Judy quietly slipped into the women's bathroom, which was an all mammal's sized space that didn't help with her feeling small to begin with as she passed by the giant toilet stalls and approached the wall. She pulled out a measuring tape from her pocket, having thought ahead to bring it with her in case of an emergency. She pressed her back against the wall and marked it with her height before taking the tape out to number the size. Her toes curled as she read the count.

56.8. She had shrunk half a centimeter over the course of waiting for dinner. No wonder these clothes were fitting better on her. Those vitamins she swallowed must have provided her body with a much needed boost to accelerate the serum's job. Giddy at the thought, she couldn't wait to see how much smaller she'd be upon waking up tomorrow.

As Judy hopped out of the bathroom, however, she bumped right into someone she didn't expect.

"Finnick?"

The little fennec fox growled slightly, though from Judy's eyes he wasn't quite as little anymore. It was almost like he had a growth spurt, no longer lingering around the height of Judy's waist and closer more to her belly button.

"Rabbit cop," Finnick replied before he gave her a look over. "Why are you smaller?"

"Wh-What are you talking about?"

"Why are you smaller?" he repeated. "Don't you'd think I'd notice? If you are as short as I am, you tend to pay attention to those around you and their height. And you're not the height you're supposed to be, so what gives?"

Judy thought about a lie she could tell before she remembered something Nick mentioned before. About Finnick being useful to them for the mission.

"Okay," she said. "You got me. It's for an undercover case. They're shrinking me down to the size of a mouse and having me pose as one so I can get some dirt on Mister Big. I took a new serum that allows for me to get smaller over a week."

"You're joking," Finnick let out half a laugh. "You'd serious let them shrink like some test bunny?"

"I'm not a test bunny, it's perfectly safe. And there's a growth serum to get me back to normal when this case is over."

Finnick's eyes widened at that as Judy sighed and lowered her voice.

"Look," she continued. "The reason I'm telling you this is so that you can help us. You're good at disguises, right? Remember the 'toot toot?'"

"Yeah, I remember..."

"Well, if you can help us out there then I promise to make it worth your while in some way. Just ask for anything, and I'll see what I can do."

Finnick thought for a long minute before sighing.

"Alright, I'll help you. But on the condition that you do something for me with this little serum of yours."

Judy flinched but she supposed she couldn't be surprised by that. "That depends on how dangerous you're being with it."

"Nothing dangerous, rabbit. I just want..."
15532121113.title: A Small Encounter with Finnick

choices: She had shrunk the expected amount.
She had shrunk way more than expected.
155321211132.content:
"I just want a little bit of what you have been using to shrink for a personal matter."

Judy blinked a few times. "You want to get smaller?"

"Not me, country bumpkin. It's for...A friend of mine."

"You mean Nick?"

"No, not that kind of friend, rabbit..."

"Oh," it took Judy a whole five heartbeats to realize what Finnick meant. "Oooh. Oh, Finnick, I had no idea you were seeing someone. Does Nick know?"

"He doesn't. And I'd like it to stay that way."

Finnick sighed as he leaned against the wall.

"Look, you'll probably realize soon enough that there are complications when it comes to being of the smaller size in this city. Love life is just one of those things. I've never been tall, even as far as fennec foxes go. And the lady I've been seeing...Well, she's not a fox I can tell you that much."

"Oh, my," Judy put a paw to her mouth but then smiled. "Well, that's still great! I'm sure she's wonderful for you."

"She is," Finnick smiled only slightly. "Just some problems in the bedroom, if you know what I mean."

"Oh," Judy's blush could be felt going all the way up her ears. "Yes, of course."

"If there was a way to bring her more to my size, even for a short while, then I would do whatever you needed me to do. No questions asked. You need to look like a mouse, I'll work out a disguise for you."

"I'll talk to the doctor about it tomorrow and give you a text," Judy offered Finnick her paw. "Just get her exact measurements and I'll get you the serum needed to make her your height."

Finnick sighed for a moment before accepting her paws. The deal was made.

~

Judy filled Nick in on her agreement with Finnick, leaving out the detail about his mysterious significant other. The two enjoyed the remains of their dinner and headed back to Judy's apartment where they planned for the rest of the evening before pulling out Nick's laptop to watch a movie. It had been decided that Nick would stay with Judy until the serum had run it's course, just to be safe.

When it was time for bed and the movie was over, Judy stretched only to find that her T-shirt was sliding down her shoulder slightly. And the jeans felt like they needed a belt to go with them. The outfit which had fit her so comfortably at dinner now was beginning to feel like it had outgrown her.

In fact, everything was starting to feel slightly bigger in her apartment. Her legs had to reach just a little bit further down to touch the floor. A glass of water was now bigger in her paws and filled her up more. She hadn't even eaten as much as she usually did during dinner, though she forced it down for the extra vitamins to fuel the serum. As Judy walked up against the wall, she could see the line from earlier that evening hover over her as Nick did the measurements.

"55.1 centimeters," he said, doing the math in his head. "You're almost 9% smaller than you were when you started the day, Carrots."

To prove that point, as she gathered up some pajamas borrowed from her sisters just starting freshman year in high school, Judy also brought her old uniform into the bathroom with her to change.

As Judy stepped into the dark blue pants and threw over the light blue shirt she had worn that very morning, she couldn't help but laugh at the rabbit staring back at her in the mirror. The uniform was typically skintight but now she truly looked like a little kid trying to be a police officer. And she could almost feel her body compressing and shrinking with every passing minute. It was almost like a gentle pressure all around her and she was being squeezed into a smaller and smaller box.

The pajamas were more fitting, fuzzy pink pants combined with the T-shirt she had worn at dinner. Judy had to stand on her tippy toes to see the mirror over the sink before she smiled satisfied at herself. To say she found all of this shrinking business thrilling would be an understatement. Though she was being diminished, she felt empowered to have control over her own size like this. As she hopped into bed, having to leap a little higher than usual, she wished Nick good night as he slept on the floor in a sleeping bag and stared up at the ceiling smiling. Even while lying in bed, she could feel the slight compression of her skin and the gentlest tickling of her fur as her body continued shrinking through the night.

She almost couldn't fall asleep out of the excitement of how much smaller she'd be when she woke up, resisting every temptation to stand up and measure herself against the wall. When she finally did pass out, she woke up in the morning to find...
155321211132.title: Shrinking Shenanigans

1553212111321.content:
When Judy finally opened to eyes for the sunrise, she didn't move at first. The blankets on top of her felt a good deal heavier than they had the night before. Her clothes also felt weightless, almost like she wasn't wearing any of them at all or they had gotten too big in the process. As she rolled over in bed, she discovered it was the later as her T-shirt was now limping entirely off her shoulder. And, as she sat up, her pajamas and panties now dangled off of her waist. Judy found that with her feet dangling off the bed, they could no longer even reach the ground. Holding her breath, Judy dropped to the floor to take her first step into a much larger world.

Compared to yesterday, it was like someone had scaled her apartment up a few sizes. No longer could she see over the dresser in the corner nor would any of those clothes fit her. It was a long process to convince her brain that nothing was bigger, it was she that was smaller.

Walking over Nick's empty sleeping bag and towards the wall with markings proved it. Judy grabbed the nearby pencil on the desk, now feeling significantly larger in her paws and not because she had to stand on her toes to reach over the desk, and shuffled over to the measuring wall while trying to keep herself decent. She was practically swimming in her own clothes. Pressing her back against the wall, she marked herself only to discover that this morning's marking was a whole head shorter than when she had started. In fact, it was a decent sized jump too from the markings the night before, though everything appeared on track.

That was when her apartment door jiggled open and in walked a massive fox with two cups of coffee and a bag containing breakfast.

"Morning, Carrot--"

Nick paused at the sight of her as Judy nervously waved at him in her shrunken state, letting her pants fall to the floor. Nick looked so much more imposing at this height and Judy felt a little exposed, but in a good way. Her stomach growled, interrupting the awkward moment.

"Well," she said. "Safe to say I'm hungry."

~

"51.4 centimeters," said Doctor Hightower. "That means in exactly 24 hours, you've lost 15% of your height."

Judy happily munched on a bagel that was 15% larger in her mouth as she sat at a stool. One obvious benefit of getting small was that there came a larger amount of food with every serving. Today she was so short that she had to finally wear full on kids clothes, donned in overalls and a pink shirt that hadn't fit her since the start of middle school but were now comfortable on her. Even the people they passed on the way to the doctor's office seemed to look at her as almost a child before they took a second look.

In the corner of the lab, the doctor remained at the same stature from the day before as she typed at her oversized computer and talked out loud while she worked.

"Very good," she said. "Very, very good. Your body is taking to the serum nicely. You're on track to be about...10 centimeters tall. A little shorter than the original goal. But what can you do when this isn't an exact science yet."

Judy already felt small enough, she couldn't even imagine what it would be like to be a fifth of her current diminished size. Her toes curled with excitement as Hightower finished with her diagnostics.

"The process continues steady for five days," Hightower explained. "Then it slows down on the sixth day to about half. Then the seventh day it stops and your body needs a moment to rest. That means at this time tomorrow--stand for a moment please--you will be about this high."

Hightower put a hoof to just under Judy's chin as the rabbit swallowed. This morning had already been such a rush in adjustment. She couldn't imagine what it was going to be like doing it every time she woke up for the next four days. That thought was exciting her.

"Do you have any questions?" Hightowered concluded.

Judy averted her gaze for a moment before jumping into the question on her mind. "Is it normal to be so...Giddy waking up like this?"

"Your body is adjusting to the serum by offering your brain dopamine to assure it that nothing is wrong. You have feel like the world around you is growing larger and not you getting smaller. That's because your brain is having a hard time keeping up. Your body is supposed to grow after all, not shrink. So it's completely normal to feel giddy."

"That's good then," Judy sighed a little. As weird as it was to shrink, it was nice to know everything was going to plan.

"You may also experience feelings of arousal, all perfectly normal too. I'd recommend even indulging in them. Sexual activity might prove to be an excellent stimulus, self administration or with a partner. It is rather kinky too, in laymen's terms."

Judy blushed at that thought, though it did make her remember something else.

"One last question. I promised a friend a favor for a favor. I know this is all supposed to be top secret but...Do you think you'd be able to administer the serum to a willing friend?"

Hightower's eyes lit up. "You mean a new test subject?"

"Well, I wouldn't call them tha--"

"Certainly," she said, immediately turning to her computer. "If I'm to go forward with this patent, then I'll need all the test runs I can get! Let me get this equipment running and we can even do it today! I just need their measurements and their species. Do you happen to know them?"

"Uh, let me ask..."

Judy pulled out her phone (which felt 15% larger in her paws) as she typed a message to Finnick. She had told him to get his girlfriend's measurements, but he had been quiet on exactly what kind of mammal she was. Definitely not a fox. Maybe Judy would get to even meet her if she hung around the lab. As she waited for a reply from Finn, she discovered that his girlfriend was in fact a...
1553212111321.title: All According to Plan

choices: Half her size, about as tall as Hightower is now.
Mouse sized, she has a gig in Little Rodentia.
15532121113211.content:
Judy had nothing better to do that day than wait around the lab. Nick was at the office as he had to get some work done as well as further preparations and paperwork before the Big case could commence. And besides that, Judy was super curious to finally meet Finnick's girlfriend.

He texted her that they would show up around noon, giving Judy the chance to walk around the city a bit at her new size. Being already a small mammal, Zootopia didn't look too much different especially when almost everyone around her was typically gigantic to begin with. Where things did start getting different was Judy's visit to Little Rodentia.

It was where the mission was planned to take place. Someone small enough on the inside to weasel their way into a ball Mister Big was planning to have and infiltrate it, checking the dirty dealings in the basement. The mobster figured that because that part of the city was so small, there would be no way for the police to plant a mole in. Or at least one that directly worked with the ZPD.

In her first days on the force, Judy could remember one incident where she had jumped the fence to pursue a weasel, causing a scurry among the little buildings and tiny denizens. Judy could recall towering over the buildings, now she was more the size of them. It was a sobering thought to imagine herself walking along the miniature streets with the mice and rats. She might have lingered around longer where it not for her stomach growling and her overalls starting to slip off her shoulder. It was the signal that she had gotten even smaller through her walk around the city and it was time to return to the lab. Though Judy promised herself she'd actually go inside Little Rodentia again once she was of a more appropriate height.

~

"49.8 centimeters," Hightower chimed in as she removed the tape measurer from Judy's head. "Progressing along very nicely. You're at around 18% smaller than your original height."

Judy's toes curled again, she hadn't expected to drop under 50 centimeters so soon and yet here she was. Standing at a height she hadn't been since the 7th grade. She had to text Nick to pick up some appropriately sized clothes for her when he stopped by the lab at the end of day, plus some consideration for how small she might be by then.

"Now then," said Hightower as she returned to her desk. "Where is your friend?"

"He should be here any min--"

Judy's now oversized phone buzzed violently in her paws as a message from Finnick that simply read "were her" in grossly misspelled fashion. But Judy was honesty too excited to finally meet this mysterious girlfriend of his to give him slack for it as she hopped from her stool and made her way to the lab front door.

Having seen him yesterday, it was a little jarring to find that instead of him coming up to her belly button Finnick was more approaching her chest in height. She had truly lost almost a whole head in height and Finnick had taken notice.

"Wow," he said, his voice laced with sarcasm. "This really is legit then, huh? Are you going to be my height tomorrow?"

"At the rate I'm going, maybe the day after," Judy answered before looking around behind Finnick. "So...Where is she?"

Finnick pointed up. Only then did Judy notice the two massive legs and the dark shadow hovering over the both of them. Judy's jaw dropped.

"Hello there," said a very accented voice as a hoof was lowered to shake Judy's paw. "I'm Gazelle, pleased to meet you."

Every pop song Judy had ever heard suddenly played in her head as she frigidly shook her idol's hoof before facing Finnick and mouthing the words "How?" Finnick just rolled his eyes as if to say "It's a long story." But before Judy could fangirl, Doctor Hightower appeared behind her.

"You must be the new patient!" the miniature giraffe as she offered Gazelle her own hoof. "Welcome! We're almost all set for you. Come in! Come in!"

Gazelle and Finnick both looked on in stunned silence, it wasn't everyday you got to shake paws with a giraffe who was two and a half feet tall, after all. As all three of them followed Hightower inside, Judy could hear Gazelle mutter in comical aside to her apparent boyfriend.

"Guess it's safe to say this is the right place."

"Now then," continued Hightower as if she were giving a tour. "With the information you provided, you are a gazelle standing at precisely 165.4 centimeters, is that correct?"

"Yes, ma'am," replied Gazelle as she struggled to find a seat in an office built for smaller mammals in mind. "I don't suppose that's a problem?"

"Oh, not at all. Giraffes are distant cousins of gazelles and just look at me! As I told Officer Hopps here, the process will take seven days to run its course and is completely reversible with a secondary dose of a growth serum. Have you thought about what size you'd like the initial dose to make you?"

Gazelle and Finnick shared a glance before she answered. "Well..."
15532121113211.title: Meeting Gazelle

choices: Spend one last night out on the town.
Convince Nick to have a little "fun."
155321211132113.content:
"Here's the thing," Gazelle went on to explain. "I have a gig in Little Rodentia from a pretty high paying client. Normally, they have a separate stage for mammals my size. But when Finn came to me with this serum you've created, that's when I had the idea. What if I could show up mouse-sized for the performance? Wouldn't that be the best show ever if I could see my clients up close and personal?"

"I think that would be splendid," Hightower chimed in as she plugged in the number on her computer. "So, final numbers would be...10 centimeters? 5?"

"Fifteen," Gazelle replied. "That'll fit for the setting and make it so we can have a little fun with each other later."

She nudged Finnick a little with her hoof and winked. Though Judy had never asked, Finnick was about 30 centimeters tall, maybe a little less. That made Gazelle practically a giantess compared to him. She was huge even to Judy now. It boggled her mind that Gazelle might actually want to become half the size of Finnick and Judy would become even smaller than that.

"Excellent," Hightower replied as her machines whirled and a familiar green liquid filled up a larger vial than before. Hightower had to produce a giant syringe from her desk that was almost the size of Judy's head. "I just need to measure the amount. You're lucky since I've done so much work on myself and our species are practically family. I should be able to be much more precise than I was with Officer Hopps here."

"By the way," Judy cleared her throat at the reminder that she was a police officer. She grabbed Gazelle's attention. "You said that you have a gig in Little Rodentia. Do you happen to know what it's for?"

"Why, yes," Gazelle replied as Hightower rubbed alcohol on her thigh. "It's for a big ball that the Big family is hosting for the birth of his new grandchildren."

"That's the same thing I'm going to," Judy realized. "I'm going there to be undercover and search the premises for illegal substances. Would you be interested in working together? Just to watch each other's backs while there in case something goes wrong?"

"Do you normally invite random citizens in on your cases with you, Officer?"

"Are you kidding? That's how I met my current partner."

Gazelle laughed before she let out a cry of pain. Hightower had stabbed her with the syringe full of shrinking serum and injected it all into her system.

"There we go," said Hightower. "Now like I said, in seven days you should be the height you specified. Like I told Officer Hopps, you might want to arrange for clothes to fit you at the various stages and take plenty of vitamins to fuel the changes happening to your body. Please stop by for a checkup tomorrow and we can confirm your process is proceeding perfectly."

"Wow," Gazelle replied rubbing at her thigh. "That was easier than getting the flu shot. Do you mind if we pick this up tomorrow then, Officer Hopps? I'd like to speak to my designer for various clothes this week and for the ball."

"Of course. I need to talk to Finn about my disguise anyway."

Finnick just grumbled though he softened up when Gazelle offered him a hoof. Though they didn't look it at first, they were a surprisingly good couple. Judy could only wonder how the two of them met. Or how it even worked in the bedroom given the sheer differences in size. Such thoughts had Judy burning at the ears, especially when she thought of Nick too.

When she actually saw Nick, she had to gawk. Over the course of waiting for him, Judy had managed to shrink even more with over a centimeter bringing her to 48.5 now. Her overalls were now constantly falling off her shoulder and the clothes Nick came bearing were a welcome relief, even though they belonged to the age when Judy was in grade school. Pretty soon she'd have to start thinking about wearing doll clothing. Judy stepped out of the lab bathroom wearing jeans and a turtleneck sweater she had worn since she was ten years old. Judy's toes curled a little more when she discovered she no longer came up to Nick's chest in height and was now at eye level with her belly button.

"Looking good, Carrots," said Nick towered over her. "Or small, I guess. What do you want to do tonight then? This might be the last night we can do something out on the town with you looking relatively normal."

He was right. At this rate, tomorrow Judy would seem beyond the size of any normal looking adult rabbit and would start to draw some attention. This might be the last time she got to go out and enjoy herself until she was small enough to visit Little Rodentia. Still...Thinking about how Finnick and Gazelle made things work made her curious to see what it might be like to have a little "fun" at this size. The rush of shrinking made her all giddy too as she decided tonight they would...
155321211132113.title: Someone on the Inside

1553212111321132.content:
"Actually," Judy said, trying to disguise her smile. "I have something more fun in mind tonight."

Nick raised an eye but said nothing as Judy wished Doctor Hightower good night before the two of them hurried back to Judy's apartment.

It was a short ride via the subway train with a different perspective on things. There was actually a bunny child who was about twelve years old that was taller than Judy currently wave. Judy smiled and gave the girl a wave while the bunny just stood there confused how there could be an adult rabbit smaller than she was. Judy just kept close to Nick on the ride, who was starting to feel more like a giant thus her protector from the growing world around her. She was even holding his paw and had to admire, while big before, how massive they now felt to her own tiny paws. And how high she now had to reach up for him.

By the time they got back to the apartment, Judy's clothes were already starting to feel loose and comfortable and they measured her against the wall.

"48.1," Nick commented. "Wow, and we were only traveling for like an hour."

"The doctor says excitement speeds up the process," Judy explained. "Because the serum is in my blood, an increased heart rate keeps it moving through my body."

"So, every time you get a spike in emotion, you shrink faster? What has you so excited then?"

"I'll show you," Judy said before holding her arms out. "Pick me up."

Nick furrowed his brow. He wasn't much for muscle and even when Judy was full size, he struggled to lift her off the ground. Still, he obeyed her command, putting both massive paws around her waist and lifted. To his and her surprise, Judy was hoisted straight off the ground with ease.

"Woah," Nick commented. "You're so much lighter than before."

"About twenty percent lighter," Judy replied, doing the math in her head real quick. "So...If I was twenty pounds before then I'm about sixteen now. A whole four pounds lighter."

"No kidding," Nick continued as he raised Judy up over his head. "And this...Excites you?"

"Kinda," Judy giggled and curled her toes again. "I just remember coming to the city for the first time and marveling at just how huge everything was to a small bunny like me. It's that same feeling only I have a comparison to stuff I'm familiar with. My apartment. My clothes. You."

Judy gulped. The rush of being held up like a doll was causing her heart to beat faster and faster. She was sure she had shrunk another tenth of a centimeter. She looked up at Nick and how she was almost half his size now.

"What about you?" she asked. "Do you...Like holding me like this?"

Nick pondered the question for a moment before admitting. "Sometimes its hard to even realize that there's a whole other section with the city of the mice and rats. They're just so small that you can forget they're there. With you though, it's like watching you almost disappear and I realize I have to be delicate and gentle."

"I'm not going to disappear though."

"Oh, I know. It's just going to be so much harder to do things together until you're back to normal again, once this mission is over."

"I can think of a few things we could still do together even if I'm the size of a mouse. There's still things we could do now, if you had the mind to."

"Like what?"

"Well..."

Judy was suddenly grateful that Nick had already brought her to eye level, it made kissing him that much less awkward. Though his snout and teeth felt so much bigger to her. Though she still feel deeper into him.

Nick seemed surprised at first, as he cradled her and brought her onto the bed. He broke away for a moment with a look of concern in his eyes.

"Are you sure, Carrots? I don't want to end up hurting you."

"You're not going to hurt me, Nick," she replied as her paws ran down his chest. "I want to see what this is like. Having a giant has his way with me."

There was suddenly a hungry, almost predatory look in Nick's eyes as he began to unbutton his shirt. Judy could begin to feel herself shrink again as every part of her body started to compress itself. She had gotten small enough that the jeans were already starting to slip off her waist, which made it easier for her to pull them off before she fell backwards on the bed as Nick continued to tower over her, shirtless and aroused.

The experience was causing Judy's heart to beat in her chest so quickly that Judy was afraid it might bruise her ribs. Rabbits had very fast heart rates, after all. That was one thing Doctor Hightower hadn't accounted for. The serum was about to speed up its process with the nocturnal activities between Judy and Nick. The question was, by how much?

During intercourse, Judy would shrink as much as she would in the span of...
1553212111321132.title: A "Little" Fun

choices: Not do it and send Judy to bed.
Not do it and call the doctor out of concern.
15532121113211321.content:
Judy could feel it happening to her. Nick's paws were feeling bigger and bigger as he wrapped around her as while as him growing larger inside of her. Her poor little heart almost couldn't take it as it pounded away, fueling her descent in height as she lost another centimeter. And then two. Before long she wasn't able to keep track as she became absorbed in the pleasure of the giant fox on top of her. She was starting to feel like a toy to him and that thought scratched a particular itch that she didn't even know she had.

Nick was getting into it too, though he slowed down as she started to notice something.

"Carrots," he panted. "You're getting smaller."

"I know," Judy moaned.

"No, like, a lot smaller."

Nick lifted her up from the bed with significantly less force needed than usual. Judy was taken into a world that was much larger than it had been a half an hour ago. Standing on the floor, the bed now came up to her chest instead of her thighs. The police uniform on the floor looked like it belonged to some gigantic bunny, when really Judy knew it was hers. And most of all was Nick. He looked so massive to her now that she was on eye level with his groin. That only gave her dirtier thoughts as she felt felt her heart quicken again as she dropped a little more.

Nick brought her to the wall with all the markers as his eyes widened upon witnessing the significant gap between Judy's current size and the one she had been less than an hour ago. He brought out the measuring tape to put a number to that difference.

"42.3 centimeters," he gawked. "Carrots, you just dropped down almost six centimeters during all that."

"About half a day's worth," Judy replied as she did the math in her head. "I guess that makes me...Seventy percent my original height?"

If she had been smaller than a twelve year old before sex, Judy couldn't help but wonder how she might appear now. For a laugh, she tried on the discarded clothes she had ripped off before they had started going at it. The jeans that had already been a little large on her were now like clown pants as Judy had to hold them up to keep them in place. The sleeves of the turtleneck now covered both of her paws in a comical fashion as Judy giggled and looked up at Nick.

"Let's go again!"

"Are you nuts?" Nick said. "Carrots, I'm starting to get a little worried about you."

Judy put on her best pout, magnified by the oversized outfit she was wearing to make her seem cuter (as much as she despised that word). "You mean you didn't like being together?"

"Wha? No, I mean, of course not. It was a lot of fun. But if doing...That is going to trigger another shrinking episode then I'm starting to get a little worried. The doctor said it's supposed to be a gradual change, right? That sudden lose in height can't be good for you."

"Oh, that's nonsense. I feel just fine. Come on, Nick. Please? Before I get too small to enjoy this?"

Nick winced as Judy struck him right in the heartstrings. The choice remained up to him though. Should they do it some more and risk Judy getting too small? Nick decided to...
15532121113211321.title: Shrinking Close Encounters

choices: Go to the doctors on her own.
Go to the ZPD on her own.
Wake Nick up to be safe.
155321211132113211.content:
As much as Nick was enjoying this, and he was enjoying it, one of them had to have a bit of common sense. He sighed heavily and lifted Judy up again and dropped her into bed while she squirmed the whole way.

"Hey!" she protested as the jeans fell to the floor and only the sweater remained on her person.

"Sorry, Carrots," Nick replied solemnly. "You gotta get to bed."

"Bed? But I'm not sleepy at all! I'm not..."

Judy let out a big yawn. Nick suddenly remembered that she had been neglecting her vitamins, which had been supplying her body with energy through the process. It burned an awful lot of energy to be constantly shrinking, after all. On top of the activities they had just done together, Judy must have been exhausted as she struggled less and less while Nick tucker her in. Eventually, after another big yawn, she laid motionless in the bed while gently snoring. She almost looked like a kid who had a long day and passed out as Nick smiled and went for the light.

"Good night, Carrots."

~

Judy woke up with the bed sheets feeling significantly heavier on top of her as she struggled to push it off of her and gave a big yawn. That was when she realized that the turtleneck she was wearing was now huge on her, she couldn't even reach her paws out of the sleeves as she tried to get to the edge of the bed which was a deeper drop than was usual. Bits and pieces of the night before played in her mind as she noticed Nick asleep in the corner, resting on her tiny office chair with a blanket around him. As Judy dropped to the floor, she stood in awe of how much bigger her apartment was while she waddled over to the wall to measure herself.

38.8 centimeters, she was now around 64% of her old height and about 10 centimeters shorter than she remembered being the night before. It was all coming back to her that their nighttime adventurers together had sped up the shrinking process by increasing her heart rate.

Judy could no longer even see over her desk as she wandered over to Nick, her smaller body allowed for softer footsteps as even her creaky floorboards wouldn't make a sound under her foot. And Nick looked gigantic. While he really hadn't grown an inch, Judy was grappling with the fact that she was now less than half his size of around 80 centimeters. It was a little intimidating if also a bit thrilling to think about. Poor Nick also looked exhausted though, no doubt wiped out from dealing with Judy's bizarre cravings. She had the idea to let him rest a little while she got up to go to the doctors for her check in. Judy had to jump to see the time on the clock.

Though it might be wise to wake Nick and have him escort her, Judy played with the idea of walking around the city at this size. Then again, she supposed she didn't have to go to the doctor's. Maybe it might do to see how the guys at ZPD might react to her.

Judy decided to...
155321211132113211.title: Resting for Now

choices: Gazelle wanting to touch base with something.
Doctor Hightower warning her about something.
1553212111321132112.content:
"Know what?" Judy said to herself. "Why don't I go say hi to Clawhauser at the ZPD? I bet he'd get a kick out of this before I head over to the doctor's to get my checkup."

And with that decision, Judy tiptoed over to her closet to pick out her outfit for the trip.

~

Judy got quite the few looks from people as she dressed up in clothes from the first grade, wearing a pink shirt with a flower on it and some shorts that were a little tight given her wide hips, despite her being the size of when she was six years old. This was simply because though she was the height of a child, she had the body of an adult. Though she was able to hide it by being so small. Most people who saw her only saw a little bunny girl who was traveling on the train all by herself. Judy, however, was in awe of everyone and everything looking so much bigger to her. She couldn't even reach the seats normally designated for smaller passengers like rabbits.

When the sub stopped, she hopped out and headed straight for the front desk. Most of the other officers were so busy that they didn't even notice the tiny bunny girl, not even Ben who was enjoying his breakfast cereal for the morning.

Normally, Judy might try to clear her throat, as at normal size the front desk was large but not so large that it left her unnoticeable. Being about 2/3's of her normal height, however, it meant that it was quite the imposing obstacle to grab Clawhauser's attention. Judy jumped with all her might and just barely managed to grab the top as she scrambled onto the desk. The sight of a small animal clawing its way onto his personal space caused Clawhauser to jump until her saw who it was.

"Oh. Em. Goodness," he said as he stared down at her. "Judy?"

Even at normal size, Clawhauser was quite large. About 170 centimers if Judy was accurate. And Judy had most definitely shrunk a little bit more on the ride over, if the shorts fitting her more comfortably was any clue. She wagered she was about 38.5 centimeters though she didn't have the tape measurer to prove it. She could only marvel at how large Clawhauser was as he put his face up to her. She was just barely bigger than his whole head.

"Hi, Clawhauser," she greeted, casually putting her paws on her hips in an effort to make this all seem like the most normal thing in the world. "Guess what I've been up to lately?"

"You're so small!" Clawhauser replied before gingerly offering a paw. "May I...?"

Judy nodded as she stepped onto the open paw and allowed Clawhauser to lift her off the ground like she was riding an elevator. He brought her even closer to his face to get a good look at her.

"This is really real then?" he asked. "I heard from a few of the guys that you were taking an undercover operation in Little Rodentia. But I didn't think they'd actually shrink you for it!"

"It's all high tech and classified stuff," Judy explained before she was interrupted by a buzzing that rocked her entire body.

Her cellphone was now too large for her to carry on her person, so she had to bring a small backpack along to hold it. It was more like a tablet now as she dug it out and saw that someone was calling her.

It was...
1553212111321132112.title: A Small Trip to the ZPD

choices: A member of the tech crew.
15532121113211321122.content:
It was a number she didn't recognize as Judy held up the comically oversized phone to her ear and heard a familiar voice crackle through the speaker.

"Hello, is this Officer Hopps?"

"Oh," Judy's mind clicked with the voice instantly. "Hi, Gaz--Hi there!"

She didn't want Clawhauser to have a freak out while holding her, the last thing she wanted to do was get dropped from this height. Even if her mass was lessened from the shrinking, it'd still hurt.

"What's up?" Judy continued.

"I just wanted to touch base with something concerning this event we're both going to. You said you wanted to get to the party, I might have a way in. But it's better if we discuss it in person."

"Of course, probably safer than over the phone. Can you come down to the station or is that too public?"

"Too public. There's a quiet place that Finn knows that's related to what we can discuss. I'll have him text you the address."

"Great! See you there soon then!"

As soon as Judy hung up, she was greeted by a buzz which rattled her whole body while holding the phone. With a few presses from her paw, she was able to determine that the address Gazelle was talking about was actually on the other side of town. While she might not normally mind that, when you were 2/3's your size any distance felt that much greater. But that's when she looked down at Clawhauser's paw as he was still holding her.

"Say," Judy said, tapping her lip. "If you promise not to freak out, Clawhauser, do you want to meet someone special with me?"

"Do I?" the giant cheetah chimed.

~

No one paid the tiny rabbit riding the giant cheetah's shoulder much mind as the two of them took the subway all the way to the listed destination. Judy figured it might be safer to bring someone with her as she got smaller and smaller. In fact, she was allowed to measure herself while they had a moment on the train. She had shrunk down to 38.2 centimeters, small enough that the once tight shorts she was wearing were now a comfortable fit and the T-shirt was starting to envelope her once again. Pretty soon, she'd have to start wearing doll clothes, a thought that made her toes curl.

When the train stopped, Judy guided Clawhauser from his neck, acting as his GPS as they navigated the streets. This was certainly a lot easier than trying to walk the streets herself with the worry of being crushed. This must have been what it felt like to be Finnick everyday.

Speaking of Finnick, when they arrived at a deserted alleyway, Judy leapt down Clawhauser's arm straight up to the fennec fox as he stood scowling while playing lookout.

"Hey Finn," Judy greeted as she looked down at him as he came up to her chin now.

"Rabbit," he grunted. "You're even smaller than yesterday. Are you going to be my size tomorrow?"

"That's the plan, at least!"

"Hmph. Well, at least you're not alone there..."

He gestured to one dark corner of the alleyway where a shadow stirred. Gazelle was wearing a dark hoodie and sunglasses, both of which looked comically large on her. That was because she seemed to be almost a full head shorter than yesterday. The serum had cause her to drop over twenty centimeters in height, or the total amount Judy had lost herself already. It had to work quicker for a mammal so large like Gazelle, though she still looked pretty giant from Judy's perspective. Compared to Clawhauser, she was significantly smaller.

"Oh em goodness," the cheetah squealed. "Gazelle! Wow! You are...Shorter than I expected you to be."

"I get that a lot," Gazelle replied with a smirk as she turned to Judy. "Well, Officer Hopps. Mind coming with me so I can show you what this is all about?"

"Certainly!" Judy said as she hopped along side the pop star. "What is this all about?"

"Well, I have a way to get you into the actual party itself, you see," Gazelle spoke in a hushed whisper. "I can get you in for a role as..."
15532121113211321122.title: A Secret Gazelle Meeting

choices: It would be possible to turn completely into a mouse.
It would be possible to assume aspects of a mouse.
It would not be possible and Judy has to use Finnick's disguise instead.
155321211132113211222.content:
"A serving mouse," said Gazelle. "As it turns out, there's a shortage of people willing to work for a party run by Mister Big, go figure."

"Yeah, imagine that..."

"Of course, that means you'll need a proper disguise to fit the appearance of a mouse," continued Gazelle as she gestured to her boyfriend. "Which is where Finn can come in."

"I can get you proper clothes for someone at mouse height as well as some attachments that will make people think you're a mouse at a glance," Finnick explained. "You'll have the size covered, at least. You're just going to not have to get close to people else they might see through the disguise. Think more like the little elephant suit I had to wear than an actual mouse."

"You mean the 'toot toot?'"

Finnick barked a grunt while Gazelle just laughed and patted him on the head.

"Regardless," Gazelle finished. "I can get you in with no problems, I'll just say I know a mouse girl who would be interested and they'll hire you no questions ask. Finnick will put together the entire persona."

"I just have to play the part of a mouse girl," Judy thought aloud before an idea hit her. "Wait a minute, Doctor Hightower mentioned that she had been working with hormones to create this serum in the first place. Maybe she has something that will allow me to be more mousy for this operation."

"You want to actually become a mouse?" Finnick asked before shrugging. "Eh, it's your body, I guess."

"Sorry, guys! I need to run and ask the Doctor right away. Thanks for your help, Gazelle and Finn! Keep an eye on Clawhauser for me!"

With that, Judy sprinted as fast as her little legs could past Clawhauser and into the street, making a beeline straight for Hightower's office.

As she ran, the sudden exercise and excitement had sent her tiny heart pounding away and triggered the shrinking hormones coursing through her veins. She could feel her shirt begin to slide further to her shoulders as the pants were starting to now feel a bit loose. She was getting even shorter than a first grader, as people looked at her running by wondering why the little rabbit girl was in such a rush.

Eventually, she arrived at the Doctor's office, having lost a considerable amount of height from her activities. Though she didn't have a tool to measure herself, she was now 36.8 centimeters tall, nearing Finnick's height and now much shorter than the pintsized giraffe who had been surprised by the bunny's sudden arrival.

"Officer Hopps!" said Hightower. "My word, you're considerably shorter than yesterday!"

"Well, there's been a lot of excitement lately," Judy said while catching her breath. "Doctor, you said that the shrink serum is distilled from a special hormone that tricks the body into constricting its cells, correct?"

"Why, yes. It's a very new field of science that--"

"Is there a way to trick the body into altering the cells into another animals? Like a mouse, for example?"

Hightower paused for a moment as she considered the question. She eventually determined that...
155321211132113211222.title: The Mouse Disguise

choices: Her ears have gotten more mouselike
1553212111321132112222.content:
"Interesting," said Hightower as she reviewed her computer. "You're in luck. Lagomorpha and Rodentia share a small thread in their respective family trees. In fact, until about a century ago, most scientists considered rabbits to be a part of the rodent family. So, there is a link that we can exploit, though it's small."

"What does that mean then?" Judy asked trying to sound hopeful.

"If we could induce the hormone with strands of that common thread into both families, we might be able to induce some traits fitting someone in the Rodentia family."

"You mean entirely?"

"No, that would be impossible given the laws of nature. What we can do is give you aspects of a rodent. Wider ears, longer tail, a snout. Just enough of an influence to grant a passable appearance, more so than what makeup and prosthetics could offer. The catch is...Well...This could all work in theory. I haven't actually tested anything like this yet and would feel much more comfortable doing a few trial runs over the next months--"

"But we don't have a few months," Judy whined. "I'm willing to suffer the consequences and sign any form for it."

"Well, if you insist, I suppose I could use a test subject...I hope you don't mind sitting tight while I prepare the hormones and the release form."

~

Judy sat eagerly holding a pen that would once fit comfortably in her paws but was now giant to the point where it almost felt like it belonged to a wolf or a tiger, though in reality it was her shorter stature which caused the confusion. And as she sat still, she could almost feel herself getting smaller by the minute. The clothes which was wearing were noticeably looser on her as the hours went by waiting for Hightower to finish the new mouse serum. Her shirt was now completely hanging on her shoulder and she had to keep a paw around her pants just to keep them from falling off.

"There we go," Hightower announced at last. "But let's get an exact measurement so we know what dose to give you. Let's see here...36.2 centimeters, you're nearing half your height already and it's only been your second day. This should continue ahead of schedule before you know it. Still estimating you at around 5 centimeters, but we'll have to see. I've never seen it progress at this rate before."

"You should see Gazelle," Judy commented as she rolled up her loose sleeves. "Ready for the injection."

Though the needle was far bigger than last time, Judy was giddy enough that she didn't even feel it as the cool blue mixture entered her veins. It chilled her whole body as goosebumps formed all up and down her arms and legs.

"Now we'll just have to see how your body reacts," said Hightower. "I will ask that you remain here for the rest of the day."

"I should probably tell Nick where I am then," Judy said as she pulled out her giant cellphone. "He's probably worried about me like this."

As she texted Nick to inform him she was at the doctor's, Judy could feel her insides churn and bubble. It was a different feeling than with the shrinking serum, which felt more like her whole body was constricting, though that was certainly still happening during all this. She couldn't explain it in any other way other than parts of her were starting to rearrange themselves making her feel less like a rabbit and more like something else.

By the time Nick arrived at the office, there was a noticeable change about Judy.
1553212111321132112222.title: Part Mouse, Part Bunny

15532122.content:
"You see, that serum I injected you with contains nanobots which can manipulate a person's body," explained the shrunken giraffe. "You've heard of nanobots, I'm assuming."

"Well," Judy thought back to her classes in science. "Yes. They're basically tiny microscopic robots."

"Correct! Though they can only do simple tasks, with enough of them you can program them to do things normal medicine simply isn't able to. Though the tech isn't there yet to understand and combat things like cancer, we do understand how cells grow and shrink through countless, careful hours of observation. With this successful trial run of my research in the field, we may be able to get the funding to expand this into breakthroughs to allow anyone to become any size, shape, or even species they want!"

"Wow," Judy replied. "Considering I come from a farm that sounds almost like far fetched scifi."

"All I need to do is prove that this has practical use in the real world! So, trust me when I say I will do everything I can to keep you safe during this case."

It reassured Judy to hear that. "Well, how does this work exactly?"

"We need to give the nanobots a few hours to run through your entire system and attach themselves to your cells. From there, I've constructed a tool to control how big or how small you want to be in the form of a wrist watch just like the one I'm wearing."

The giraffe held up the silver watch that hung limply on her wrist. It had a single black screen with a down arrow and an up arrow. The screen had on it a number which Judy guessed what the doctor's current height was. 87 centimeters. She watched as Hightower produced a similar looking watch from her desk.

"Now," she explained, handing the device over to Judy. "Obviously the watch won't shrink with you, so you'll have to be careful. In the wrong paws, I imagine this could be quite dangerous. I would recommend giving it to someone you trust rather that hold onto it yourself. But the choice is yours and I won't tell you how to do your job, officer."

Judy nodded and thought for a moment before deciding to give ownership of the watch to...
15532122.title: Nano-Shrinking

155323.content: What if Nick and Judy were doing a sweep of a lab that got broken into and find a device that could change reality to ones most deepest desires which they accidentally activate. Shenanigans ensue.
155323.title: Neither, something else.
